You try to climb up her legs to unbutton her button, causing her shorts to fall.
You form another idea (be creative).
111331131121.content:
You walk underneath the woman. You have nothing against her, but you have no choice. You want to get home with your family.

She’s wearing a uniform shorts, sneakers, and matching polo shirt. She appears busy preparing a drink from her large wheeled cooler, oblivious to you.

You form a plan…
111331131121.title: Forming a Plan

choices: You’re successful.
She moves before you can get them together.
Something else happens.
1113311311211.content:
Her shoelaces, you think to yourself. That would work.

You go straight for her shoelaces. You pull at her bow, untying each lace. You then grab the gigantic ropes and begin to tie them together.
1113311311211.title: Shoelace Trick

choices: She trips.
She pulls through the knot.
Something else happens.
11133113112111.content:
You land a large knot. You can see your captress has been watching you through the corner of her eye, making sure to not make stewardess see. She emits a large grin after you tie the knot.

You have only to wait a few seconds until the flight attendant begins to walk down to the next row.
11133113112111.title: Tying the Knot

choices: She scoops you up before anyone can see you.
Someone or a few people notice you.
You use the commotion to get away.
111331131121111.content:
The stewards takes a step, pushing her cart down, not knowing that her shoelaces have been tied. Her heel yanks against the knot. The tout lace comes straight towards you, tripping you at the waist.

The flight attendent falls right into the drink cooler. Her body knocks it down the aisle until it crashes into some unsuspecting first-class passenger. It tips over towards the aisle, spilling drinks over the passengers on everyone nearby.

She continues her fall after knocking the bin away. Her body continues until she lands flat on her face. Somewhere on the way down, she hits her head harshly against a metal armrest of the seat in front of her.

Everyone looks over to see what the commotion is. Your captress barely suppresses her smile seeing the whole scene.
111331131121111.title: Big Fall

choices: They try to figure out how her shoes got tied together.
Other people come to help, so your captress is able to go back to her seat.
Something else happens
1113311311211111.content:
“Oh my gosh,” your captress shouts, leaping quickly out of her seat before anyone can react. “What happened?!” Already knowing what was about to do down before anyone else, she could react before they fully process everything.

She unlatches her seatbelt and reaches to over to help the stewardess up. In the same swoop, she snatches you into her palm before anyone else can see you.

“I don’t know,” the flight attendant explains. “I just fell. My head hurts.”

“Let’s get you sitting down,” she states as other people come to rush to help her. She holds the flight attendant’s hand with her right hand, while cupping you in her left.
1113311311211111.title: Swooping in to Save the Day

choices: Your legs are too tiny and the woman scoops you up
You manage to get out of her reach just in time.
111331131121112.content:
You wait anxiously for the stewardess to move. You feel bad that you’re hoping for the poor woman to trip but at the same time you don’t want to be the captive of a clearly deranged businesswoman. Suddenly you see the woman lift up her foot to start walking. To you it seems like everything is going in slow motion as you hold your breath.

The woman pulls through the knot as if it wasn’t even there and continues to walk down the aisle. You curse to yourself knowing that you missed your only chance. With fear rushing through your every muscle, you look up to see your captress smiling down at you.

“I was hoping you’d fail” she says reaching her grant hand towards you ready to engulf your tiny form. Without a moment to spare you take off running.

What happens next?
111331131121112.title: She pulls through the knot.

choices: She just moves on. No biggie.
She punishes you for it.
She gives you a second chance on a second prank.
1113311311211121.content:
You try to run, but she simply scoops you up onto her palm and brings you to her palm.

“Well, that was a fail,” she states matter-of-factly.

“Yeah, she was stronger than I expected,” you respond.

How does she react to this failure?
1113311311211121.title: Back with her

choices: “You will be the mascot of my company”
“You will help me maintain my beauty”
The woman in the other seat wakes up and the woman tosses you back in her purse
11133113112111211.content:
“No big deal” your captress says. “But remember what this means?”

You gulp in fear, remembering what she told you would happen if you failed to pull a prank.

“No, no please!” You beg. “I need to get back to normal size!”

“Sorry Little guy” says the women. “We had a deal, and you failed to do your task so now I get to keep you. This worked out well, for me.” She said with a smirk.

“What the hell makes you think you can do this?!” You say angrily. “I’m a human being and I have rights!”

The woman moves her palm and you close to her face to where that’s all you see. The Asian woman stares into your soul before giving you he same smile she did the moment she kidnapped you.

“Because you are just the cutest little thing I have ever seen and I want to keep you. I got this successful by getting anything I want by any means necessary. And that includes not letting you go.” She says with a huge smile on her face despite her menacing tone. “And because you’re teeny tiny and there’s nothing you can do about it. You need big people to make decisions for you.”

Her words send fear through ever fiber of your body. The last thing you want is to be this woman’s possession.

“What’s going to happen to me?” You say with fear engulfing you.
11133113112111211.title: She just moves on. No biggie.

choices: You reluctantly introduce yourself
You remain silent, still in disbelief
Someone noticed you two talking
111331131121112112.content:
“Maintain your beauty?” You ask in disbelief.

“You heard me” replied the business woman.

“How exactly am I supposed to do that?” You reply.

“Simple, paint my nails, help me apply my makeup, give me pedicures and manicures, massage me after long days, help me apply lipstick, things like that.” She says smiling at you.

“But that will be humiliating” you complain. “Why do I have to do that?”

“Hey, I’ve worked my ass off to get where I am now. It’s about time I have a servant, of course I always pictured him being normal size but now that I think about it, a tiny man like you will work even better. Plus it’ll be nice to have a little cutie like you to keep me company everywhere I go.” Continues the woman.

“‘Every where you go’?” You ask, not liking where this is going.

“Well of course” replies the woman excitedly. “You’ll ride in my purse with me when I go to work, shopping, vacation, or wherever. I can’t trust you to not to try to get away. Besides, it’ll be nice having a little cutie in my purse to assist me whenever I need it.”

You continue to stair at the woman in disbelief that is this actually happening to you. You can’t believe that one moment you were rushing to catch a plane to visit family, and the next you’re some woman’s property.

“Oh! How rude of me!” Says the woman. “I never introduced myself. I suppose I should now that you’re mine. My name is Tiffany, I work as a fashion consultant. What is your name my little cutie?”

What happens next?
111331131121112112.title: “You will help me maintain my beauty”

choices: Try to get someone’s help.
Hide somewhere secure.
Too late. Someone notices you before you can think of a plan.
1113311311211122.content:
Her hand comes for you, and you run like your life depends on it. Given her annoyance at your failure, it seems to. You run towards the other aisle, dashing underneath the one of the seats just in time before she can nab you.

You run under the seats to the window as far away from her as you can. You sprint through various belongings stored underneath the seat, not taking the time to see what they are.

You seem to have phased her. She’s up trying to discreetly scan for you, but as long as you remain back here, she can’t get to you in a socially acceptable way. The people form a kind of barrier protecting you.

You know she’ll try something creative though, so you have to form a plan fast. What do you do?
1113311311211122.title: Got Away

choices: Hide somewhere safe
Try to get the woman’s attention
Suddenly the business woman bursts through the curtains, looking for you
11133113112111222.content:
Immediately behind you, you see the curtains separating first and economy class. Knowing that it would be harder for your kidnapper to find you there, you dash for the curtains as fast as your tiny legs could take you. You made it much to your relief.

Suddenly, you hear a deafening boom of a high heeled shoe coming down just centimeters from where you’re standing. You hope and pray that it’s not your captress trying to rekidnapp you. You slowly look up and to your relief it’s just a stewardess who’s about to give safety instructions. After a closer look you realize it’s the same woman whom your captress made you pull the failed prank on.

Luckily, she doesn’t know you (or anyone) tried to make her trip. You quickly come up with two moves to make next. You decide that you could either try to get the woman’s attention and hope she will help you, or you can find a safe place to hide for take off.

What do you choose?
11133113112111222.title: Hide somewhere secure.

choices: Find a more discrete  hiding place
Ask the woman for help
The woman saw you use her boot as a seatbelt and grabs you
111331131121112221.content:
You figure that you’ve been kidnapped once and you don’t want to risk it again. You decide that finding somewhere safe to lay low for take off would be your best bet. You hear the door to the plane slam shut and your heart sinks as you realize your one way out has been sealed off. You begin to shift towards finding a safe place for take off.

As the stewardess begins giving pre flight safety instructions in her booming voice, you look around for a place that won’t be too dangerous for departure.

You see a chubby red headed woman in her late 20s a few rows down wearing long black high heeled fashion boots with laces going all the way to the top of the boots. She’s busy reading a book and doesn’t look like she’s paying too much attention to her surroundings and her laces would make for a perfect seat belt.

Seizing your opportunity you dash under the first rows of seats weaving through people’s feet before making it to the woman. Crossing your fingers, you slowly climb on to the woman’s boot and slide in between the laces.

You catch your breath and let out a huge sigh of relief as the plane takes off. As the plane levels off you think about what to do next. You think about asking for help, she doesn’t seem to mean but then again neither did that businesswoman. You figure your other option is to find a more discrete hiding place in case your captress comes looking for you.

What do you do next?
111331131121112221.title: Hide somewhere safe

choices: You find a way out of the woman’s purse
You hear the voice of the businesswoman and stay put.
1113311311211122213.content:
Just as you are about to climb out of the boot, you feel a pair of fingernails pinch the back of your shirt like giant tweezers.

“Uh oh” you say to yourself as you’re slowly pulled out of the boot laces.

As the giantess lifts you up to her face and places you on her open palm you get a better look of the woman who found you, and the surrounding area.

Your new captress is the only one sitting in the row, which explained to you why she wasted no time grabbing you. She has straight red hair down passed her shoulders, bright blue eyes, slightly larger than average breasts, and she’s wearing a navy blue causal dress. She’s also wearing a pearl necklace that goes slightly passed her breasts.

You curl up into the fetal position as her eyes examine every inch of you. You quiver in fear as she stares at you in disbelief. Slowly, a giant, sweet looking, smile blooms across her chubby face.

She quickly looks around before picking you up again. This time, you see her taking her purse from the seat next to her. She quickly drops you into her purse and you fall onto something soft. The woman is still smiling that sweet looking smile at you as she zips you up and inside. You feel a slight thud as she sets her purse on her lap, patting it slightly before leaning back happily in her seat.

“God damnit not again!” You shout outside.

You just spent all that effort escaping the clutches of a deranged businesswoman and now you’re right back where you started, just in a woman’s purse. You feel angry and scared at the same time.

“Well at least she didn’t look quite so malevolent” You think to yourself after having a chance to calm down.

Still, you reckon you need to get out of there.

What happens next?
1113311311211122213.title: Kidnapped, again

choices: “Yes, he’s in my purse”
She laughs and says “A tiny man? No, I haven’t seen him”
11133113112111222132.content:
Just as you begin to think of a way out of the purse, you hear a voice you hoped you wouldn’t. You hear the muffled voice of the businesswoman talking to the woman who has you in her purse. It’s not entirely clear but you can still hear everything she’s saying.

“Excuse me Miss.” Said the businesswoman

“Yes?” Your redheaded captress responds.

“This is going to sound really crazy, but I’m looking for a tiny man. He gave me the slip just before the plane took off. Have you seen him?” The businesswoman ask.

You freeze in fear with your eyes wide open and butterflies fill your stomach. You cross your fingers, hoping that this woman won’t give you back to the businesswoman. Then again, you figure neither one of these ladies seem to be very keen to help you but you figure that currently you have a better chance with the red headed woman, especially since she gave you that loving smile earlier.

What does your captress say?
11133113112111222132.title: Frozen in fear

choices: She returns you
She refuses to give you back
111331131121112221321.content:
You shoot up in fear when you hear those words uttered from your captress' mouth. The last thing you want is to be given back to that businesswoman. You put your ear to the wall of the purse to hear what else the two giantesses are saying to each other.

"You have him??" the businesswoman asks excitedly.

"Yeah I found him strapped to my boot when the plane was taking off" your current captress stated.

"Well, he's my little pet and I want him back. So if you would kindly return him to me I would be very much obliged"

What does your captress do?
111331131121112221321.title: “Yes, he’s in my purse”

choices: She tries to buy you back
She grabs the purse and tries to take you out
She calls over a stewardess
1113311311211122213212.content:
"I'm afraid I can't do that" you hear your captress say to your original kidnapper.

"Excuse me?" the businesswoman responds indignantly.

"Firstly, he was strapped to my boot so finders keepers. Secondly, when I found him he had the most terrified expression that I had ever seen. You must not be the nicest owner if he had a look like that. So I think he needs a gentle lady like me to be his owner, not you."

How does the businesswoman respond?
1113311311211122213212.title: Finders keeper

choices: Stay inside the purse
Escape
111331131121112221322.content:
“A tiny man??” The redheaded woman laughs. “That’s funny they haven’t started serving alcohol yet.”

“I’m serious.” The business woman replies. “He’s tiny, has short brown hair, brown eyes, and tiny nerdy glasses.”

Your current captress continues to laugh as if she thought the business woman was crazy.

“Sorry uhh...”

“Tiffany” The businesswoman replies.

“Right, Sorry Tiffany I haven’t seen any tiny man roaming around” says your captress confidently.

“Ok, sorry to have bothered you. He can’t hide from me forever anyway” Replies Tiffany in a threatening tone as she walks back to her seat, scanning for you.

Your current captress smiled triumphantly patting her purse while letting out a faint giggle to herself.

Meanwhile, you let out a huge sigh of relief after realizing that this woman wasn’t going to give you back to your original kidnapper who’s name is apparently Tiffany. While you don’t know the motives behind this woman, you’re just thankful you don’t have to go back to Tiffany. There was just something about her that felt really off to you.

After taking a few minutes to recover from that intense moment, you mull over what to do next. This woman did do you a favor by not giving you back to Tiffany. On the other hand, you remember that you have no idea why she did that, and you wonder if it would maybe be a good idea to escape and get help from someone more trustworthy like airport security when you land.

“It would be hard to get help from the proper authorities if I’m trapped in a woman’s purse” you think to yourself.

What do you decide?
111331131121112221322.title: Relieved, maybe

choices: The woman takes you to the lavatory to talk to you
The woman drops something in her purse
You sleep for the rest of the flight
1113311311211122213221.content:
You let your gratitude get the better of you and you decide to remain in the woman's purse.

"There's no way I'm going to get out here during the flight and it's safer in this woman's purse rather than roaming around the cabin where Tiffany can see me." you reason to yourself.

As the journey continues, you hope to yourself that you made the right decision staying with this woman. You remind yourself that the look she gave you didn't look malevolent so you reason that she won't want to hurt you. Then you think that maybe she looked to0 friendly. She might just want to keep you for herself or do something that doesn't involve helping you get back to normal. With all these thoughts going through your mind you begin to feel overwhelmed. Eventually you calm yourself down and try to think about the positives of your situation, like being out of the clutches of the businesswoman. You tell yourself that whatever your new captress haves in store for you, you'll have to wait to find out. With that in mind you try to get some sleep.

What happens next?
1113311311211122213221.title: Stay inside the purse

choices: The rest of the trip is uneventful
A stewardess saw Stephanie talking into her purse
Writer's choice
11133113112111222132212.content:
You are startled by the sound of your captress unzipping her purse, you are blinded for a few seconds by the light that suddenly rushes in. You look up to see your captress smiling down at you holding a cookie. She looks around quickly and leans in close to her open purse.

"Hey there" she whispers at you.

You can feel her hot breath surge towards you with every word she speaks. You fearfully look up at her smiling face anticipating what she will say next.

"Don't worry sweetie, I won't hurt you. My name is Stephanie" she continues. "We will talk more later, but for now here's a cookie. I don't want to risk you being discovered by someone else but I also don't want you to starve."

"Th-thank you." you say.

"Don't mention it. Enjoy the rest of the flight" she says with a smile.

With that she zips up her purse again leaving you in darkness. She was right, you are starving but the cookie she gave is more than enough nourishment at your size. You still are skeptical of this woman's motives but you start to relax a little. As you finish the cookie, you feel satisfied and grateful that you were given food.

What happens next?
11133113112111222132212.title: Gift from the Goddess

choices: She stashes you away again for take-off.
She hides you another while continuing the conversation.
The flight attendant notices you on her lap.
111331133.content:
“Excuse me, Ma’am,” the flight attendant walks over, breaking the conversation. “Please tuck your purse under your seat or in the overhead bin for take-off.”

She rolls her eyes slightly like she’s mildly frustrated but knows the flight attendant’s right.
111331133.title: Under the Seat for Take-Off

choices: The woman takes her purse out and finishes her conversation with you
You’re left in the overhead bin for now
Writer’s choice
1113311331.content:
“Sorry sweetie, but you’re going to have to go back in my purse for bit.” Says your captress with a cutesy frown.

Before you can speak the woman plucks you off her lap and drops you back in her purse. She smiles down at you as she zips it up. You feel a sudden elevating motion, you swear that she’s lifting the purse up to her face. Your suspicions are confirmed when you suddenly hear her slightly muffled voice.

“I’ll put you in the overhead compartment so you can’t escape. We will finish our little chat later.” She says.

You can hear a sliding motion as your captress puts her purse in the overhead bin. Your heart sinks as you hear the loud *click* of a stewardess shutting your only way out.

You can hear the muffled voice of a stewardess giving flight safety instructions followed by the aircraft’s powerful jet engines lifting the plane into the air. You wonder what this woman has planned for you and hope you can convince her to help you when she lets you out again.

What happens next?
1113311331.title: Back in the purse

choices: Going with a Teenager.
Hanging with the Mom.
In the Backpack.
112.content:
You decide that staying out here was tantamount to suicide and trying to get someones attention while they're busy rushing around for a flight was just as dangerous. The smartest choice would be to hide somewhere that would get you to someone where they're not rushing around, preferably a ticket gate for a plane. You spot a family with a bunch of luggage and carry on bags on the floor nearby, just close enough for you to reach safety. There's only 3 of them, all female. A mother and probably two kids from either a previous or current engagement.

There's a girlish purse, probably the teenager girl's. Then there's a more sophisticated purse, probably belonging to the mother. After that is a little girl's backpack. Which choice would suit your current needs best?
112.title: A Plan.

choices: You are crushed
The woman sees you at the last minute
A hand grabs you just before you are stepped on
113.content:
You figure that if you stay where there's a ton of foot traffic and try to get someone's attention, you will eventually get noticed. You see your chance as you look straight ahead and see a woman walking straight towards you at a casual pace. She looks to be in her mid 20s with long curly blonde hair and a pale face. She's slightly on the cubby side and she's wearing a blue tank top, sneakers, and jeans.

"HEY DOWN HERE! HELP ME!" you shout at the top of your lungs.

She doesn't seem to notice you but you're determined to get her attention despite the risks.

"MISS LOOK DOWN! YOU GOTTA HELP ME!" you shout again, while frantically waving your arms.

Again, she doesn't notice as she walks closer and closer to you. To your horror you look up to see the oblivious woman's sneaker raising off the ground and move directly above your head. You scream in terror as it descends down upon your miniscule body, you close your eyes preparing for the end...

What happens next?
113.title: Bad idea

choices: She tells you she’s a friend of the fairy folk
She’s a collector of tinies
She’s an intelligence operative
1133.content: Before you know it, you’re pocketed into the army jacket of a hippie chick. After covering her tracks with an argument towards the chubby chick over their collusion, she removes you from her pocket in secrecy.
1133.title: A hand grabs you just before you are stepped on

choices: The hippie chick becomes concerned for your wellbeing
The hippie chick becomes angry with your denial
The hippie chick is collecting “mini-men” for the fairy queen
11331.content: “But I’m not a fairy! I’m a human who’s unsure how he was shrunken.”
11331.title: She tells you she’s a friend of the fairy folk

choices: “I’m a trusted human business partner!”
“I’m a duchess in Her Majesty’s court.”
Inside a “sacred circle”, she reveals her plan to rescue you
113313.content:
The hippie chick laughs. “I never said you were a fairy. I collect mini-men for Her Majesty, the Queen of the Fairies.”

“WTF!”

“Well my dear, the fairies aren’t winged nor tiny. Mostly they are people but of another dimension, realm or universe. They only manifest differently when they show up here. But when I deliver you to the Queen, you will find that their magic is very real!”

“Who is this ‘Queen of the Fairies’ “?

“Oh, different fairy leaders set their eyes on different areas of Earth. Mind you, the fairies are all matriarchal so these leaders are all queens and highborn ladies.”

You feel like you’re going insane. Maybe you are. But whatever’s happening isn’t going to stop now so you ask, “And who are you?”
113313.title: The hippie chick is collecting “mini-men” f...

choices: “But the Fairy Queen has almost given me the power to conquer a subcontinent!”
“It pays the bills lol!”
If I don’t have Her Majesty’s trust, she will destroy me, you idiot!”
1133131.title: “I’m a trusted human business partner!”

choices: “Leila’s friend on her shoulder goes to Baroness Emilia!”
“Leila’s friend on shoulder goes to Countess Sherry, my most reliable Sheriff!”
Leila and her friend shall receive a private audience.”
1133132.content:
“What’s a duchess?”

The Hippie Chick (or perhaps more accurately, the Fairy) rolled her eyes. “I forget your people lack a proper monarchal system.”

She paused. “A baroness presides over a substantial district. Many of these sit in a county under a countess. These counties are in provinces led by duchesses. Distinct and separate peoples are spread out in many provinces each under a Queen. And then the Queens of Peoples have a Queen of their own, the Empress.”

As she said this, you noticed you were leaving Earth for this realm of hers. She was out of her hippie chick clothes. Now she wore a white tunic with colorful patterns on the edges of the tunic cloth. She had pale skin, bright blue eyes and blonde hair that passed her shoulders.

Winking, she said, “I won’t be angry if you pull my hair. In fact, I encourage you to cling to it for the ride,” saying these words as she set you on her right shoulder.

As she walked out of her house, into the streets and to the palace, you actually managed to secure yourself for the otherwise-bumpy ride rather easily by following her “advice”.

“What’s your name, duchess?”

“Oh!” She said absentmindedly, “It’s Leila.”

Leila wasn’t really thinking of you so much as the fairy who be manhandling you.

The Queen would decree the handover of the little guy as a reward for the services of her favorite. Who would that be? That upwardly mobile baroness? Sherry, Leila’s protege, who was made a Countess for being the best of the Queen’s Sheriffs? As the gap between realms had increased over the centuries, catching wild humans as new pets came to require the strongest magic to bridge the gap between realms.

What’s more Sherry had subordinates but no real sidekick. The competition among fairy women was too toxic for that. But a little cutie that Sherry could keep in a pouch as she went out and abroad? Sherry would loooove that!

But then Leila frowned—perhaps the Queen had requested the urgent capture of a wild human, to be rendered tiny, for her Special Project. Hopefully that wouldn’t end in bitter defeat!

Leila stood in the front row of the audience of ladies before the Queen. You’re put off by how the Queen and her ladies ignore your presence after what has been done to you. And then she speaks!
1133132.title: “I’m a duchess in Her Majesty’s court.”

choices: A philosopher and priestess
A mighty military commander
An architect and engineer
11331321.content:
Baroness Emilia was 5 foot 4, had red, curly hair and a serious body posture. But her face betrayed relief that you could relieve her of the seriousness of her cares. She smiled generously to you, as Leila set you on her shoulder.

Then the Queen gave a speech congratulating Emilia. From the speech, you learned that Emilia rose from nothing due to harnessing her magical powers, loyalty to the Queen and work as
11331321.title: “Leila’s friend on her shoulder goes to Bar...

choices: Smiling, she says, “The Queen gifted me a Concubinus.”
Mischievously, she says, “At HQ, you’ll be a perfect toy!”
Sternly, she says, “Now you’re #1,000 of my slave-soldier regiment!”
113313212.content: Emilia’s face flashed concern when the ladies went to the feast. But only momentarily. Shrewdly she placed you in a jacket pocket close to her hip, whiled away some hours at court and then fished you out in her own mansion.
113313212.title: A mighty military commander

choices: “You’re a toy, nothing more!”
“You must fight to the death if it glorifies your Queen!”
“You are to be sold, you crazy idiot!”
1133132123.content:
In spite of everything, you laugh in her face.

“Slave soldier? Ma’am, I’ve been shrunk and even at normal size lack the magic all of you seem to have.”

The fairies had had mixed experiences with capturing wild humans and training them to be slave soldiers. Oftentimes they remained tiny and without magic. Units of such slave soldiers were fit mainly for parade drills and war games befitting a lady of war.

But with the right magic, fairy women could enlarge slave soldiers and infuse them with magic for battle against the enemies of their ladies. Afterwards, the ladies could safely shrink them and drain their magic. It saved resources and greatly shrank (pun intended!) the risks faced by the Crown of mutiny.

Of course, the Crown found that the Armed Forces was expensive in terms of pixie dust. Sometimes the Queen questioned Emilia about whether she could gain pixie dust for the Crown by marching a slave-soldier regiment across a table and allowing the women sitting on the side-benches to pick a little darling of their choosing or perhaps a little (pun intended!) collection. Each of those women would pay a fixed fee in pixie dust per tiny!
1133132123.title: Sternly, she says, “Now you’re #1,000 of my...

choices: Do whatever it takes to win this gruesome game
Beg for your life to the slave-soldiers
The Baroness interferes in some way...
11331321232.content:
Baroness Emilia puts her palm over you and covers you in darkness. You are unable to see anything else of this magical world as you bounce around, in the pitch black cover of the giantess's covered hands. After what seems like a few minutes, but also an eternity of being violently moved around the surprisingly rough palms, you are carelessly dumped out into the light again.

The Baroness's disapproving face briefly covers the sky before pulling away from blocking the sunlight. Around you, you see that there are walls all over, made of mud and sticks. It in fact looks almost like some type of outdoor arena, without any of the seating all around.

You think you might be alone until a sharp stick flies past your head and ends up on the other side. "Hey! Who the hell..." You turn around and see two other slave-soldiers with tiny metal armor. "Oh crap, hey look I am small too..."

You hold your hands up to block them from coming closer to you. They advance slowly and one of them still hasn't a sharp stick in his hand. From somewhere out of view, you swear you hear the Baroness laughing. So this is what they do to the people they shrink... a process of elimination to serve their Queen and empire...
11331321232.title: The Arena

choices: "Your results are satisfactory; you are now a private."
"Your results are good; you are now a sergeant."
"Your results are excellent; I will take you to the Officer Academy myself."
113313212323.content:
Running back, you find another stick. You tense up holding the stick until the two slave-soldiers approach.

"THWACK!!!"

You break the knees of one assailant, forcing the other back. The Baroness appears again, with her giant face hovering over the arena.

"So you have a fighting spirit," she muses, with a strong softness given her colossal voice.

She picks up the slave-soldier whose knees you broke. "Ah, my sweet Theodore, it seems that I must give you a ride in my coat pocket in the infirmary."

She moves Theodore away from your sight, presumably pocketing him in her coat. She continues, "This is your Platoon Lieutenant. Follow him to the barracks. He will see to your basic training."

Then she left. For two months, you are subjected to a grueling basic training. At the end, the Baroness returns.
113313212323.title: The Baroness interferes in some way...

choices: The Regiment will retain your services.
You will be transferred to a fighting regiment.
Your services are no longer needed; you will be auctioned off.
1133132123231.content:
Your giant regiment commander paused.

You wonder what she's thinking. It could be that you will be retained for the Regiment, a regiment for the reserves and training department of the Queen's Army. You could be sent to the front. On the other hand, you hear that the war is almost over and that "your" Queen is winning.

In that case, you could be auctioned off to who's knows who.

11331321232323.content:
"I can?"

"Yes. Actually, it's a polite way of saying "must"--the Queen has been asking the Regiment Colonels for one recruit each to form a Guard Regiment."

"So what will be my duties?"

"Well, the magic of this universe means that it isn't as straightforward as in your universe with its lack of magic. You could guard the perimeter. Alternately you could be trapped in a pocket, purse, cage or table drawer for most of your days, only for the magic to call out to fight full-size when your Master needs a bodyguard."

"My Master?"

"Technically, that's the Queen but in practice she usually delegating mastery of bodyguard tinies to whichever courtier she wants him to guard."

1133132123233.content:
After carrying you to the Officer's Academy in her coat pocket, she hands you over to the Superintendent. The Superintendent looks as if she is a younger relative of some sorts. The Baroness is in her late 20s; the Superintendent is in her early 20s, maybe even one or more years younger though clearly a young adult.

The Superintendent places you at the entryway to a dollhouse barracks. "C'mon, little fellow, into the Academy--you dare not disappoint the Baroness." That is your introduction to a year of training.

You learn about military politics. Apparently the salary of the Baroness as Colonel of her Regiment is based on a fee per soldier, as each soldier is--as a slave of the Queen--a Crown Asset that the Regiment Colonel is paid for managing. The Queen however requires her Regiment Colonels to deduct a small fee of the larger fee they receive for each soldier delegated to the command of a junior officer, for the benefit of the junior officer.

This however is only true, if the junior officer is a free fairy woman. As Regiment Colonels win the Queen's trust, she tends to grant them privileges, privileges to hire themselves for subordinate positions as well as their command position and privileges to extract slave-soldiers out of the Regiment to keep as personal property.

Of course, if the Regiment Colonel also holds subordinate positions, the rule of "one position per person" still applies, meaning that she must delegate that position to one of the slave-soldiers she pocketed as her own. Even then, a truly trusted Regiment Colonel would have plenty of slave-soldiers that she could keep as household assets.

Indeed when free fairy women, of which a quota always had to be employed as Regiment Officers, themselves gained the trust of a trusted Regiment Colonel, then the Regiment Colonel had a customary obligation to signal her trust by donating a slave-soldier to the junior officer as a sort of tip. Then as the junior officer rose up, she herself had to decide which ones to entrust subordinate army positions to and which ones to keep as household assets.

When Baroness Emilia, your Regiment Colonel, returned to visit your class's graduation ceremony, she
1133132123233.title: "Your results are excellent; I will take yo...

11331321232332.content:
Turning to the Academy Superintendent, the Regiment Colonel says, "Her Majesty the Queen has three new assignments for your excellent work.

1. You can be a Professor at the Academy training generals. You are allowed to pocket a graduating cadet as a Teacher's Aide.

2. Since your excellent teaching skills draw on your excellent fighting skills, I can promote you from Major to Regiment Colonel. The Regiment will be a front-line regiment and as you know the war is already bitterly fought. To ease your stress, you will be permitted to pocket your favorite student as a pet.

3. Since the officers you have trained have not just strengthened my regiment but also five hundred other regiments, the Queen is willing to appoint you to a seat on the Senate. If you accept, you will be allowed to bring a cadet with you as an office pet."

The Superintendent makes her decision and you are off to a new phase in a new life in a new universe as a...

113313212323323.content:
Your new master, Senator Rosemary, came into the Senate from a military background as opposed to rival senators coming from the civil service, the trading community or the very numerous relatives of the Queen. To show off her power as a former military officer, she could assign you to Hat Guard duty. Basically since Senators from a military background often wore brimmed hats resembling those of American colonists or those of pirates in our world, the dip between the brim and the dome covering the head, formed a trench.

How cutesy, then, to have a shrunken slave-soldier repeatedly circle this "trench" as a guard. True, the guard was not more powerful than that which he guarded. It was the other way around, like how the castle tower was far more powerful than the guard on top on watch duty. The effect then was to emphasize how the master was "a tower of power" relative to the tiny guarding her from her hat.

Another use she might have would be to use you to court other Senators. Or maybe spy on them.

1133132123233231.content:
Every step Senator Rosemary takes ends up with you holding for dear life onto the nearest wall of her domed hat. It is hard not to feel like you're going to fly right off, hundreds of feet in the air, and end up in her cup of coffee, or worse, stomped under her colossal deadly black boots.

She doesn't even bother trying to communicate with you. Instead, time to time, a long manicured nail flies over the hat and flicks you around or slashes at your terrified, fleeing form. The Hat Guard position is even worse than you thought it could be, you think bitterly. The giantesses here treat the slave-soldiers like their expendable property, until they get bored and find something new, you gulp. The day goes on, Senator Rosemary is in and out of meetings.

Throughout passings in the hallway, you even swear you see other Hat Guards, waving their arms frantically at you, as if there is any escape. But there has to be, you realize. She can't just keep the hat on all day. Everything begins to rumble. There sounds like hundreds of foot steps everywhere and you have to cling even harder to the hat. The Baroness calls out your name.

"Come to your master. Climb onto my palm."

You obey.

"As a piece of inventory in this Crown Regiment, you would be most useful as an addition to the pay of the commanding colonel. I am her. You will swear allegiance to me as a slave-soldier owing loyalty to his commander and master."

You comply with this instruction as well before the graduating class of your fellow tinies and the two fully-grown female fairy officers.

Even as you complete the last words in your oath of allegiance, your "commander and master" is ready to move to the next thing. Accordingly she pockets you into her uniform coat before you even finish the oath! The rest of the graduation is something you hear at a distance from the darkness of her coat's waist pocket.

From what you had learned of this new universe's military politics, the normal upward limit for a slave-soldier was a Platoon Lieutenant, commanding 30-40 fellow slave-soldiers. Higher ranks however were sometimes available for slave-soldiers who were proxies for a powerful slave-master.

You could be made a Company Captain commanding about 100 slave-soldiers. Not only would the Regiment Colonel--your Master--get to keep all of the command fees from the Queen, she would be paid an additional salary, for your work had earned a salary but since she owned you, that salary would go to her. Of course, it was a common enough courtesy for a manservant that had proven his worth to his master to have that master donate treats from that salary to him, at her discretion.

Or you could be made a Major on her Regiment Staff. This would net the Baroness less money than if she made you a Captain but it would enable her to imprison you in her headquarters doing overtime to plan her victory while she and the other free fairy officers were off the clock or perhaps even bar-hopping together.

The boldest move would be for her to make you Lieutenant Colonel, the second in command. This would maximize her command fees and additional salary. This was very rare and reserved for an especially favored slave-soldier, usually one desired by his Master, the Regimental Colonel, as a Concubius (basically a concubine, only male) or even more rarely as a husband. But surely, something odd would have to be afoot for her to entrust you with a Lieutenant Colonel's responsibility fresh from the Academy?

But the Baroness, the Commander and Colonel of your Regiment as well as your Master personally, was clear. You were now a...

113313212323332.content:
The Baroness uses her magic to make you regrow but only up to the waist of 5' 4" figure. This was to balance both your cuteness and efficiency as a manservant. There were three common fates for slave-soldiers repurposed into the waist-high manservants of superior officers.

1) They would attend to their superior officer, wherever she went.

2) They would work at a palace owned by the superior officer. Powerful spells would guarantee that if the manservant walked out the door, they would merely teleport to the opposite end of the house, placing him at the service of the palace 24/7. But while the palace would be treated as important enough to take his services in perpetuity, its owner, his owner, may visit frequently or rarely, at her discretion. It and he after all were her property, to do with as she pleased.

3) The superior officer would not allow lesser officers to bring manservants. Instead she would hire out her manservant to the junior officers for a mandatory fee and a demonstration of administrative efficiency.

You shout, “The nerve of you! You shrink me and then expect me to butcher people for you.”

The Queen and Leila discussed many plans. One to entice the little assassin into the service of the Queen. One to torture him into abject submission. “Why should I trust you?” as you ask the tanned, black-haired Queen with robes resembling traditional Hindu costume.

She pets you with her finger. “If you don’t want to do it, you can stay as a honored guest. But personally I want to be a champion of liberty so taking down the Empress and restoring you to your previous condition are both part of the same end goal.”

For some reason, this puts you at ease. “I’ll do my duty for Liberty and the Queen.”

“Good,” she says, “here is a belt, a sword and a scabbard. Poke the Empress with the sword and she will be struck with a magic poison whose curse will end her!”

The Queen paused. “I know you and Leila got off on the wrong foot but think of the three of us as best friends. No need for formalities—I’m Parvati, she’s Leila and we will use our art magical to keep you safe! Accordingly once the Empress is struck, you will arrive back here, from where you will be discharged to your home!”

You bow, “Thanks, Parvati.”

She kisses you, “My little hero!”

What kind of Queen is this Parvati?

If she could cast an enchantment on you, making you forget your previous self and making you believe that all along you were her slave-soldier, a lackey who owed her his life for her benevolence and protection, then she would reach the Apex of Sorcery. At that point, it would be clear that she would soon suppress the Empress and indeed might be able to defeat the other six Empresses of her world.

She could be an honest and true Warrior Queen. She could enlarge you to full size, hug you gratefully and then send you back to the airport.

Parvati exclaims, “Oh that! Well everything part of that, your enlargement and then your transport back to your home realm costs the Crown pixie dust. Unfortunately due to budget cuts, I must levy a deduction on your share of pixie dust.”

She pauses, as you stand in shock. Then she grins, “But you still get something!” as she sprinkles a few grains of pixie dust on you. The world around you shrinks which means you’re growing. Then it stops!

“How am I now?”

Parvati says thoughtfully, “Leila made you an inch. The women of this world are the same size as human equivalents in spite of our reputation as fairies. And...”

She positions her thumb against your body, “It looks like you’re the size of a woman’s thumb!”

“WTF, bitch!”

Parvati’s mood towards your insolence is playful rather than angry. “Pixie dust in this world is equivalent to money in your world. A prudent Queen extracts all the value she can from her budget, especially the Army budget. Fortunately, I have more missions that I can assign to you which means more pixie dust!”

You seethe. Laughing at the anger on your face, she says, “The immediate challenge is to use you as a bait to take out the many courtiers of the Empress with powerful art magical. Once ALL of them are neutralized, I’ll let you grow to my waist and you can sit on my lap at the feast I’ll hold for my pint-sized hero. And beyond that? I haven’t planned that far!”

You react instantly.

114.content:
"What is that?" You heard a voice shout. You look behind to see a giant girl staring down at you. She is tall and skinny with long legs (especially long for you) and looks to be about 12.

Before you can respond, you are snatched and hoisted into the air. She lifts you up to her face and opens her palm out to get a better look at you. You can do nothing but stand on her palm and stare back. She has dirty-blonde hair and blue eyes.

"What are you?"

"I need your help. I..." you began to stammer but are quickly interrupted. She's too shocked and confused to listen to you.

"You're like a doll. Except so realistic! And you talk!"

"I'm not a doll..." you tried to interject, but again you are interrupted this time by a voice calling from far away.

"Anne, come on! We're going to miss the plan if you don't hurry!"

"But mother I found something!"

"I don't care. We need to go. We still need to go through security."

"Yes mother."

She then closed her fist and ran to follow behind her mom. You were stuck on the roller coaster of your life as she thrashed her arm (and thus you) up and down. Eventually, the hell stopped when security line. While she's waiting, she unclenched her fist to determine what to do with you. What does she do?

The problem is that you are surrounded by busy traffic: standing in the line where dozens of passengers are waiting to board their plane. You have to find a place to hide where you can see most of the airport.

Suddenly, a thunderstorm bellows above you as the line of people around you start moving. You must act now. You see a large section of seats in the corner against the wall, off to the side where no one seems to be. Not having time to look anywhere else, you rush straight there, avoiding the volley of feet on the way over.

You get there in a nice corner, sort of next to some seats but far enough away that you suspect that no one would bother you. The only thing over here is an outlet. You can still see most of the airport terminal, however, and can take the time to observe the crowd.

As you're observing the crowd, your heart jumps in horror as you spot someone walking steadily over to the area where you're hiding. You're too afraid to look up, all you see is a pair of black designer boots and a pair of smooth feminine legs closing in. You quickly run to a dark corner under the row of seats, hoping she didn't see you. You look and see she's getting closer and closer. With every step she makes, the sounds of her footsteps get louder and louder. As the ear shattering booms cease, the woman sits down on the seat right on top of you: the one place you hoped she wouldn't sit.

"Of all the places in the airport to sit, she had to sit here" you mutter to yourself.

You hear the woman hum to herself as she plugs what you assume is a phone charger into the wall. You realize that it may not have been the best idea to hide somewhere near a phone charger where nobody is sitting. You begin to remember how you loved to sit in quiet places to charge your phone whenever you were travelling and you realize the mistake you made.

You slowly walk to the edge of your safe haven right between the woman's legs and look out at the empty gate. You realize it's nighttime and that most of the flights have come and gone for the day. Brushing off the thought, you see rows of seats all the way to your end goal that you can use as checkpoints to catch your breath and hide from anyone who may be in the area. You figure your only problem is the woman who's sitting right about you. You have no idea if she's alert or not. You take a deep breath and hope she isn't.

You begin to sprint to your first checkpoint as fast as your little legs could carry you. You don't look back, you're scared enough as it is. However, the realization that nobody has spotted you yet does force a smile out of you. Suddenly, you hear a familiar boom. Then another, and another. Soon the ground begins to shake as the booms get louder and louder. Your heart nearly jumps out of your chest as you realize that the woman must've got up and is heading straight towards you. "A little man that a girl was trying to smuggle in on her carry-on."

"I see. Okay, thanks for your help. I can take it from her."

With that the security officer left. You look up at Rachel. She's a brunette with bony face and brown eyes.

"Can you help me?" you ask.
11432122.title: The Girl Sticks to the Books

choices: Rub
Refuse
114321222.content:
"I don't know," she answers. "What does 'helping you' involve?"

You explain to her your predicament and that you want to go home, and then again ask for her help.

"Well, I can't technically let you in after this incident. You were found in her possession, so you have to remain at the station for the sake of records."

"What do you mean?! I'm a person, not some record!"

"Well, little person," she corrects. "It'll be a bureaucratic nightmare to get the proper clearance to let you through. It'll be easier to just keep you here."

"What!"

"Plus, I always wanted a little man like you. It would be more fun to keep you."

"But..."

Now her face suddenly turned stern and mean as she brought it right up to your body. It was like a house to you. Her lips were directly in front of her mouth. You gasped as you realized that it alone was twice your size.

"I wouldn't talk back to me if I were you," she scolded. As she talked her breath, blew my face and back backwards almost knocking me down. After she finished her statement, she blew a little, toppling me over completely. She smirked in enjoyment as she brought her face back over top of you. Her lips were practically touching you as you lay paralyzed with fear.

"Are we clear?"

"Yes," you reluctantly concede.

"Now the first thing I need for you to do for me, my little man, is give me a foot rub."

Before you can object, you are picked up and dropped on the ground beneath the desk in between her giant feet. She's wearing heels that she flicks off, nearly falling on top of you.

"Come on. Give them a good rub."

You look at her huge smelly feet. Her toes are wiggling inviting you over. Do you rub them or not?
114321222.title: Security is not that secure after all.

choices: Directly to see her friend
Detour
1143212221.content:
You walk over to her right foot and begin to rub. The moment you touch it, her foot reflectively wiggles pushing you over. You begin with the big toe and then move down the various toes. You can hear her groaning from above as you rub.

"That's it little man. It feels amazing!"

Within a few minutes, the phone rings.

"Hello,.... Hey Sarah! How are you?.... Yeah, yeah I can talk right now. I'm not too busy...."

You can here talking on the phone to what sounds like some friend. As she jabbers on, you continue rubbing. You are now down to her third toe. As you reach your arm in between her third and fourth toe to start rubbing, your arm gets stuck. Frantically you try to push it out, but you can't. Rachel keeps on talking, not noticing your predicament. As a matter of fact, she seems to have forgotten about you entirely.

"Yeah, I would love to meet after work...."

She lifts her leg up and places it on her knee. With you wedged in between her toes, you are now stuck, dangling into the air.

"We should totally catch up..."

You look up at her from underneath the desk. She's paying absolutely no attention to you. You desperately try to loosen yourself from this bind, but to little avail. You kick and cream, but she takes no notice. You wiggle your arm a little, which seems to tickle her. This causes her to loosen her grip and suddenly you are free.

You are filled with joy until you look down at what looks like a six story drop. The bind was what was keeping you from falling. You quickly latch onto her toe with your two hands. Your legs and the rest of your body are dangling over the edge as your arms hold on for dear life. You attempt to push yourself up or latch your feet unto the underside of her foot, but that tickles her and causes her to wiggle her toe up and down. You left arm looses it's grip as the wiggles. You have only seconds until imminent death.

"Okay, well I'll see you in a few minutes. I have something to show you that you'll like...Okay, bye now."

She hangs up the phone and brings her foot back down unto the ground. Now given your positioning underneath it, it lands on top of you.

"What are you doing there?!" she interrogates. "I told you to massage my feet, and you've been slacking off."

"I..." you protest, but that only makes her angrier.

"Now I have a friend to show you to, but I guess you'll also need a little punishment for talking back to me."

She picks you up with her toes and drops you into her heels. You fall downwards to the front and before you can climb out, she joins you. At first her toes slam you against the front wall, and then slowly slide you underneath them. With the smell and constant pressure, you don't think things could get much worse, but then she gets up and walks. Each step pushes her weight on top of you and soaks you in her sweat.

Does she take you directly to see her friend or does she take a detour first?
1143212221.title: The Careless Talker

choices: She went to the grocery store to get dinner.
She went to a store to get some toys for tonight.
11432122212.content:
She walks with you in her shoe. Each step is like thunder. You can't tell where she is going, though soon she reaches some kind of store. She purchases some items. You try to scream as she stands in line, hoping that others can hear you, but to no avail.

In a few minutes, she takes you out to show you what she got. Where did she go and what did she get?
11432122212.title: Need to Get Some Things Along the Way

choices: Wait it out, she might notice you.
Try to escape!
11433.content:
Outside the backpack everything is going smoothly, the little girl and her mom are going through security while you are in the girl's backpack. The force of the book pressing against you feels like it's crushin you to death, the backpack goes through security without incident. However as the backpack is lifted up the book, you, and the snack fall down to he bottom of the bag, you still pinned in between during the fall. When you and the other objects hit the bottom, the force of the book falling behind you pushes you strait through the covering of the snack below you through a very thin tin covering and you are thrust into a very thick and slightly warm liquid.

Struggling to the surface through thick liquid you finally get to the surface and breath in as much air as you can, but something is off about the smell. After a while you realize that you've fallen strait through the top cover of a yogurt container and the hole 1 inch you made is barely noticable to anyone.
11433.title: Airplane snack

choices: "Yes sweety I'll get some out for you."
"Not now honey, maybe later."
114331.content:
Waiting in the container is oddly soothing, the yogurt is somewhat warm and the container and the backpack muffle the sounds and block the light from outside. At first there is a lot of shaking and movement from outside but it soon stops, when you assume the girl got on he plane. Now all you have to wait for is for the girl to get hungry and open the yogurt and then hopefully notice you, hopefully.

After around an hour you've gotten used to life in a container of yogurt, all you can smell is a mix of yogurt and the girl's sweat because of her dirty shorts and t-shirt you see through the transparant container. You also realised how big the container is aswell, they must've had alot of yogurt they wanted to bring and just dumped it into the biggest container they could find. Around an hour later you hear loud muffled talkin from outside the bag, but you can't make anything out.

"Mommy can I have some yogurt as a snack?"
114331.title: Yogurt life

choices: The little girl, eagre to eat her snack!
The mother decided to eat it instead.
1143311.content:
The muffled talking stops shortly after it started but you assume it's nothing. You're starting to get a little anxious about your plan, what if it doesn't work and she eats you? You try to brush the thought off but you. Can't stop thinking about it, what if you become a snack to nourish a 12 year old girl, or what if her mother eats you instead? Through all the thinking you hadn't noticed that the top o the bag had just been unzipped and a hand was heading strait for you container.

You were suddenly jerked back to reality by a hand grabbing the container and lifting it out of he bag, your confidence in your plan was starting to fade. Just then the hand carrying the container is joined by another one to take the lid off, however it has a little trouble doing this and you are jerked up a bit. The force was insignificant for the mother holding the container, it was a whole other story for you. The jerk ipward pushed you down deep into the yogurt making it impossible to see you from the outside, suddenly a spoon was placed into the container, but who was holding it?
1143311.title: Moment of truth

choices: She noticed you!
Her spoon is right under you!
11433111.content:
The spoon was placed into the container and handed over to the little girl. At this point you were certain that your plan would fail, as you were now deep under the yogurt and the girl was about to begin eating her favorite snack.

"There you go Gracie, enjoy your snack." the deafening voice that was the mother's said. Gracie you repeated in your mind, you chuckled a little bit to yourself convinced you were going to die, at least you knew who was going to eat you. You still couldn't rap your head around it though, if you were normal sized and saw a 12 year old girl, you neer would have guessed that she would be the one to end your life.

"Thanks mommy!" you heard from above as you desperately tried to resurface, and finally you did. Floating in the yogurt you looked up and got your first real good look at the girl destined to eat you. She was a beautiful girl, she had bright blonde hair and a pair of blue eyes, a cute pointed nose was what carried your view down her face to her small pink lips and from them to her angled chin. Gracie's blonde hair was tucked around her shoulder and it almost matched the colour of her soft white skin.

While looking at all her features you hadn't realized she was looking right at you.
11433111.title: Notice me!

114331112.content:
Brought back to your attention you notice Gracie is staring right at you! Excited that she noticed you you try to bring your arms up from the thick yougurt to wave, but then somehing hits you in the legs from below, something metallic! Suddenly you are raised up into the air at staggering speeds towards Gracie's face!

Everything seems to be going in slow motion as you look up at Gracie's face, you can't blame her for not noticing, you're only an inch tall after all. While staring at Gracie's colossal face you realize there's no point in trying to escape now, you're weighed down and stuck on a spoon about to be eaten by a massive god-like 12 year old. Gracie puts the spoon in her mouth and pulls it ou leaving you stuck in her mouth, her tongue pushing you up against the top of her mouth mushing you up in her saliva and yogurt. Gracie's massive tongue pushes you around her mouth getting every taste she can from her yogurt, the pressure is immense and you can't see a thing, you open your mouth to scream but your mouh is filled with gracie's saliva, her tongue moves you to the left side of her mouth hitting you against her teeth forcing you to swallow a mouthfull of 12 year old spit. When she's done tasting you, she pushes you to the back of her mouth.

GULP

You and a mass of saliva saturated yogurt go strait down her esophagus and into her stomache landing with a plunk in her stomache acids. The burn starts almos immediately, you know you don't have much time left before you incinerate to nutrients.

In your last moments you think of what you will become, Gracie will digest you for nutrients, slowly breaking down your body for the parts it needs absorbin them into her body. Your legacy will be being consumed by a little girl and becoming part of her body. Under the extremely humid musk of Gracie's stomache you start to think about it. If your body was simply goin to become a part of a beautiful girl like Gracie, you were okay with it.

Your last thoughts before you drifted off never to awaken again were with becoming part of Gracie, your body was digested and broken down for nutrients, and became part of her.
114331112.title: A snack!

You are in a state of shock, you were sure you were going to get crushed but you don't have time to feel lucky. You are certain that you will die when your tiny body makes impact with the ground so you close your eyes and prepare for the worst.

You wake up confused. You take a look at your surroundings. Everything seems huge! The room in which you are standing looks like it extends for miles. The earth below is in perpetual vibration as colossal legs and feet make their way through the airport. You never noticed how busy and chaotic this place was until everything's been blown up to mass proportions. Before you can get your bearings straight, a giant foot comes right towards you. The thing is ten times your size and about to land on top of you. You just manage to jump out of the way in time, but the noise produced by the step alone is enough to hurt you. You look up, and it's just someone casually walking by with no idea of your presence, unaware of your near death experience.

You regain your composure and begin to plan what to do, when you are interrupted by...

You look up to see a towering airport security officer just inches away looking down at you with her hand covered over her open mouth in shock. She has hazel eyes, long black air tied in a bunt, and looks to be in her early 30s. You're somewhat relieved to see her as you were hoping to get help from a security officer. You wave your arms trying to convince her that you're real. She takes her hand off her mouth but it still hangs open in disbelief. She mouths: "oh my God!" and reaches for you. Her painted finger nails pinch the back of your shirt and hoist you into the air. The g-forces take you by surprise but you're glad to be off the floor where you could be stepped on.

She doesn't take time to examine you, instead she quickly drops you into her breast pocket and seals you inside. You're in total darkness as you feel the woman start to walk through the airport. You are kept secure inside the pocket and you can't move easily but it's not uncomfortable. You have enough room to breath. As the woman walks farther, the noses of the busy airport fade away. Suddenly, the woman stops walking and opens her pocket and you see her reach inside to grab you. Knowing you can't do anything, you let her pull you out. The woman drops you in your open hand.

121133232133332323321.content:
You climb the tie of the giantess with the name tag “Rogers” before she notices.

But eventually she does, “What are you doing, little fella?” She asks with a Southern drawl, as her red lipstick, bright blue eyes and pale, cream-colored face beam down with an adoring smile.

“Well, ma’am,” you say, “I’m just basking in the beauty of an extraordinary woman in the field of security.”

“Why! Thank you!” She says, with a wink.

“One thing I disagree with many women on is the manliness of ties. I think that a woman who can kick my ass looks fashionable in a tie. Always!”

Rogers let loose an amused snort. “Of course, you would say that.”

“But the most fashionable part of a tie is the knot. Your knot and I are about the same size...which is about?”

“An inch,” supplied Rogers matter-of-factly.

“Right! Now imagine you introduced a new fashion, a bigger, better tie. With a knot, the size of your thumb. Why then, you’d have to enlarge me to that size to keep the theme of your fashion consistent!”

Rogers’ laughter shook her rib cage. She had to steady you with her fingers to keep you from being thrown from her tie.

121133232133332323322.content:
You realize that to get better treatment you need to soften these women’s icy hearts. They do think you’re adorable. Perhaps you could bond one-to-one. The businesswomen might be too materialistic to get you the concessions you want. And the security women whose uniforms have ties scare you—specifically you’re afraid an accident with a tie could knock you on your ass or send you flying! It would seem that if any of these women would soften up and help, it’d be the women in uniform without ties!

Three stand out.

One has the age and posture of a woman with seniority, even in relation to her colleagues at the table. She seems bored and ready to unleash some aggression. It would seem that her discipline would be stern even by these people’s standards. But the same no-nonsense approach could work in your favor, if she were turned in your favor by listening to her frustrations and sympathizing. You have her pegged as the Alpha Female.

Another has a worried expression. She’s noticeably younger than any of her colleagues. Perhaps she’s hit the ceiling on her rise in seniority. It would probably take a decade or two before she had enough standing to help. But if you sympathize with her no matter what, surely she’d use her power when she got it for reform, right? You have her pegged as the Baby of the Panel even though she’s in her mid-30s.

Then there are two such women talking about how they couldn’t do the amazing things they do without “our heroic tinies”. Special Forces apparently have tinies in the keeping of officers in coops. They’re trained and maintained as tinies. Unleash them as targets full-sized, then transport them back to the coop tiny after the battle’s fought. They’re way more flexible than enlistees!

Intelligence on the other hand transports tinies as still tiny but for more covert operations. And because transport is wormholes, there’s no need for full-sized people to retrieve them. Butter up these commanders and (maybe?) get better treatment through the Glory of War.

1221.content:
“Well aren’t you a cute little thing” Sandra says in a seductive tone.

Her voice was booming which stunned you.

“Please miss, can you help me?!” You shout. “I’ve been shrunk and I need help!”

“I don’t think so.” She says. “It’s not everyday I find a shrunken man. I’m going to keep you for myself.”

“What?! You can’t do that!” You exclaim. “You can’t just..”

Before you can finish your sentence Sandra drops you in her bra.

“Looks to me like i can” Sandra laughs. “I’m bigger than you and you’re tiny and helpless. You need a lady to look after you. Who knows what would have happened to you if I didn’t come along.”

In a twisted way you realize she has a point. While she may not have any interest in unshrinking you, you do feel safe and secure in her bra.

“Well enough of that” she finally says. “I need to get to my plane. It looks like you’ll be coming with me. The girls are going to love meeting you” she adds looking down at you with a wink.

With that she starts walking. Her bra is actually comfy. It’s not too tight for you so you don’t feel like you’re being suffocated, but it wasn’t too loose either to where you’d get jostled around. With every step she took there was a loud boom that registered in your ears. The motion of her walking was actually very soothing to you.

You couldn’t lie to yourself, you were enjoying this a little. You were riding between the breasts of an extremely attractive woman who didn’t seem to have any menevolent intention towards you.

On the other hand you were also terrified. You had no idea what the giant stewardess was going to do to you, and you knew for sure she wasn’t going to help you out of your situation.

After about 10 minutes of walking she reaches the gate where her plane is.

What happens next?

You are woken up by a sudden motion. After a few seconds you realize it was Pam getting up from her seat and grabbing her carry on. You are quite surprised with how well you slept especially seeing that it was in some strange woman’s purse. You hate to admit it but that bed Pam made you was really nice.

You feel a steady swinging motion as you are carried off the plane and into the airport. Every step Pam takes registers as loud booms in your tiny ears. After about ten minutes Pam stops walking and light floods your vision as Pam opens her purse in a secluded part of the airport. All you can see is her giant hand reaching for you. Before you can get out of the way she scoops you up in her soft palm and brings you to her face.

“How was the flight little one?” She asked smiling at you..

“It was nice” you reply begrudgingly. “The um, bed you made for me was very comfy...”

“Awww, good” she coos. “See? I told you I’d take good care of you and you’d like being my pet”

She moved you to closer to her mouth, puckered her lips, and gave you a big wet kiss. Your tiny body was completely engulfed by her beautiful lips. She slowly moved you away and giggled as she saw that you had a thin layer of saliva covering you from head to toe.

“Well I bet you’re hungry. Here, I saved a bit of a cracker from the plane for you.”

She was right, you were hungry. You gobbled that cracker right up. Pam smiled as she watched you eat your snack.

What happens next?

Before you can finish your sentence Pam suddenly picks you up with her thumb and index fingers and brings you close to her face. You are too startled to finish your sentence.

“You don’t really have a choice little cutie” she says smiles tickling you with her giant finger. “Now let’s get you home” she coos.

Before you can say another word Pam lowers you back into her purse and zips you up. You realize she’s getting into her car as she removes her purse from her shoulder and sets it on the passenger seat.

You can hear Pam humming various tunes to herself as drives home with her new pet. After about 20 minutes she stops. You again feel the sudden motion of Pam grabbing her purse. You heart pounds in fear as you hear her enter her house wondering what humiliation you’ll have to endure.

Pam then opens her purse, plucks you out, and cups you in her hand.

1231131122112.content:
“A what?!” You shout.

“A bath” Pam says calmly. “You’ve had a long day of travel and you need to be bathed”

“I can wash myself thank you very much” you reply with as much dignity you can muster.

“Aww you’re so cute when you act all dignified and independent” Pam says smiling at you. “Now don’t be silly, I’m your owner and I will bathe you.”

Your heart sinks as you hear those words. You’re a grown man and you always tried to be very dignified. The last thing you want is come giant woman controlling you and doing whatever she wants with you. Even if she has benevolent intentions.

Pam walks to the kitchen sink and sets you down on the counter. You watch her fill the sink up all while checking the water temperature with her hand.

“Now let’s get rid of those pesky clothes” Pam says reaching for you.

Knowing what she plans to do, you try to run but she’s too fast and she grabs you. She holds you in one hand while forcibly removing your tiny clothes one by one. You kick and shout at her but all she does is giggle.

“C’mon” she says. “Stop squirming and let mommy take care of you.”

“Mommy?!” You yell back. “You’re only a few years older than me!”

Pam ignores you as she finishes undressing you. She then gently lowers you into the water to get you all wet. She leaves her hand under you in the water as she lets you enjoy the warmth of it. You hate to admit it but the water actually feels really nice and you start to relax.

“Close your eyes” she orders

You do what she says and Pam gently lathers your naked body with dish soap. You then are gently dunked into the water and rinsed off. She then dries you off by gently blowing on you.

“There, now that wasn’t so bad was it?” Pam says sweetly.

You shyly shake her head at her reluctantly admitting she’s right. Pam smiles and starts petting you up and and down your back with her finger.

“Can, can I have my clothes back?” You ask as you stand naked in her palm.

Pam carries you up the stairs to her bedroom and places you on her bed. You see her go over to her dresser and search for something. Finally she comes back over to you holding in her hand a little sailor’s outfit. You look at her in horror.

“Where did you get that?” You ask.

“I made it” she replies gleefully. “I used to like to make tiny clothes for my dolls when I was younger. I still have some of them and I think you’d look so adorable in this!”

“There is no way I am wearing that!” You insist.

Before you can get away her giant finger pins you in place while her other hand puts the sailor outfit on you. You try to resist but Pam is far stronger than you and within moments she successful but it on you.

You stand on her bed feeling humiliated as she put her hands on the sides of her face and gasps with glee.

“You are just the cutest little thing!” She squeals. “I think this will be your new outfit from now on.”

“Get me out of this!” You shout. “This is embarrassing.”

12421.content:
When Megan arrived at the airport today, one thing that ranked very low on her list was finding a shrunken man on her way to the flight. Flying back home for winter vacation was going to be a nice change from all the hustle and bustle of school. And after this stressful situation, it would feel even better. She had passed through security with this little guy, and somehow not even drawn a look of suspicion. As she was waiting to be boarded, Megan noticed that this flight was not crowded whatsoever. She slipped her feet out of her ballet flats to let them breathe. The little guys could wait, by the looks of things, she would be alone to talk to him.

The story inside this woman's purse however is something else entirely. Having to sit here, surrounded by gargantuan tubes of chapstick, tampons, her wallet, phone, keys and a variety of other assorted items was uncomfortable. What was going on? Why had the TSA guys not seen him?

The worst part for you had to be the waiting and uncertainty. Time in here was hard to judge, and you had tried to move the Iphone for yourself, without any signs of success. Just waiting had to be the most boring thing to do when you were an inch tall.

After what felt like an eternity, boarding began. Quickly counting, Megan noticed 17 people. 17 out of room for 90. When she found her seat, she was ecstatic. She could lounge out without being annoying. Before she put her purse in the overhead though, she reached in to grab little guy. When she did, she had a hard time not laughing. Just a guy looking up at her next to her tampons was pretty funny. However she knew it was no fun and scooped him out.

"Look we can talk after all the stupid stuff with the plane. I'm Megan, by the way." She said to you with a smile. You returned one.

"Thanks for helping me Megan, I'm -" and you were gagged as she covered you when the stewardess walked by. WHen the plane was finally up in the air, youu and Megan turned your attentions to one another. She started.

"So..."
