“Sleep tight little man” she says smiling down at you and winking.

With that your captress zips up her purse and starts walking. You are jostled about in her purse as she rushes to make her class. After about 10 minutes you can hear Tammy sitting down in a noisy classroom.

“Hey Ashley!” You year Tammy say. “I have something you just have to see after class!”

“What is it?” You hear another voice (who you assume belongs to Ashley) ask.

“I can’t tell you here” Tammy insists. “It’s-“

Tammy is cut off by the instructor beginning the lesson. You quiver in fear wondering what Tammy plans to do with you next. You can’t imagine it’ll be anything nice given the way she looked at you when she deposited you in her purse.

You can’t stand the thought of being trapped against her feet again. You also don’t want to suffer the humiliation of being shown off to her friend(s).

You notice a small hole at the top of Tammy’s purse.

“She must have not zipped it up all the way” you think.

It’s a golden opportunity to escape but you also know that if you’re caught Tammy isn’t going to be happy.

Thinking for a minute you decide to...
13221121.title: Your ordeal is done.

choices: Someone grabs you
You hear Tammy’s voice
Readers choice
132211211.content:
Determined not to be a slave for the rest of your days you make the decision to try and escape. You push a tube of lipstick upright against the purse and climb to the top, just under the zipper hole. With all your might you push the zipper open as hard as you can. It moves only an inch but luckily for you it’s just enough to climb out.

With no time to lose you hoist yourself out of the hole and slide down the purse. You get a tingling sensation in your stomach, like the time you went on a giant roller coaster.

Taking a second to look around, you look up to see Tammy paying attention to the lecture. You also notice she’s sitting in the desk closest to the door.

“I can’t believe my luck!” You think as you bolt towards the door and slide under the crack.

You again look around to see you’re in a hallway. You figure the best option is to try to find a science professor. You start walking down the hall in hopes that you can find a science professor.

Just then..
132211211.title: Make a break for it

choices: The woman who sold you
A foreign exchange student
A middle aged woman who looks to be in her mid 40s
1322112111.content:
As you’re walking down the hall you see a pair of giant high heeled boots step out in front of you. You look up to see who they belong to but all you see is a huge open hand heading right toward you.

Before you can get away the woman scoops you up in her palm and traps you in her closed fist. You feel g-forces as you are hoisted up into the air. The woman then starts walking hastily with you secure in her hand. Her high heels register as loud booms with every step she takes. After a few minutes, the woman stops walking and opens up her hand and lifts you up to her face. You look up to see the giant face of...
1322112111.title: Someone grabs you

choices: Someone on campus
One of my friends
Someone far away
13221121111.content:
“Well hello little guy” the woman says smiling down at you. “I didn’t think I’d see you again.”

“That girl you ‘sold’ me to is crazy! She treats me like a fucking slave!” You shout with a mixture of fear and fury.

“Yeah... a lot of my customers like to do that” she admitted.

“You knew?!” You shout:

“I had a feeling, but hey like I said it’s not my fault how your new owner treats you. I’m just making money to get through college.”

“I’m in college too and I don’t go around shrinking and selling people!” You yell.

“I’d watch your attitude if I were you” the woman says playfully wiggling her finger on your tiny body. “I better give you back to your owner now. She’s probably missing you.”

“Oh god! Please don’t!” you beg. “Just please unshrink me!”

“No can do little guy. I can’t have you going to the police and getting me in trouble. I have a better idea. I will resell you. You can get away from Tammy and I can make more money off you. It’s a win for both of us” she says with enthusiasm.

“But you can’t just..”

Before you can finish your thought the woman puts her finger to your mouth, silencing you.

“No buts little one. You have no say in this. You should be thanking me for this.” She says in a smug tone.

“What are you going to do with me” you say in a fearful tone.

“Well, there’s no shortage of women who’d love to get their hands on you so I can pretty much send you anywhere. I think I’ll sell you to..”
13221121111.title: A familiar face

choices: She agrees to help you.
She wants to keep you like a pet/toy.
She doesn’t have time and tries to just leave you safe with someone else.
13221121113.content:
You look up to see the giant face of middle-aged Hispanic woman. She lifts you to closer to her to get a better inspection of you. Her cupped hand allows you to see that she has long curly hair but not much lower than her shoulders.

“Oh my gosh,” she eventually exclaims. “You’re a tiny person!”

“Yes,” you reply. She takes in the fact that you can talk.

“How did you get like this?”

“I don’t know. This just suddenly happened,” you explain. “You have to help me.”

She pauses for a second before getting distracted by the intercom. It’s clear that she has a plane she needs to catch. What does she decide?
13221121113.title: Closer Look

choices: Submit to survive
Give me liberty or give me death!
132212.content:
"I will never be your slave!" you shout defiantly.

She simply chuckles, wiggling her toes. This makes you loose your precious grip and fall. You land hard against the ball of her foot. The sock fabric cushioned your fall enough to prevent broken bones, but not enough to hurt you.. She moves her foot on top of you and presses lightly. The pressure is like salt in the wound.

"Now II would get just as much pleasure from killing you right now. Maybe I'd buy another shrinkee who was more obedient. So this is your final chance: Are you willing to submit to being my slave?"
132212.title: Stubborn

choices: She wants to keep you
Gift you to her daughter
Gift you to her friend
13222.content:
You look up and see a pale, slim woman that looks like she’s in her early 40s. She has dark blue eyes and long, curly, slightly dirty blonde hair. She smiles and gently scoops you up from your kidnapper’s hand and closes you in her fist.

“Thank you so much!” You hear then woman say. “He’s perfect.”

“You’re welcome.” Says your original captress. “I tired to find one that fitted your exact specifications”

“He fits them all and more” your new owner says in an ever-so-slightly sinister tone that worries you. “How much was he again?”

“$500,000” Says the woman

“My god!” You think to yourself. “I never thought I was worth that much.”

Your new captress drops you in her shirt pocket and walks over to her kitchen table to write the woman a check as if half a million dollars was nothing.

“Here you go” she says.

With that the woman leaves and your new captress plucks you out of her pocket and cups you in her hand. She grins at you as you quiver with fear in her palms.

“Well are you a cute little man.” She says with a gleaming smile. “My name is Pamela. What’s yours?”

You nervously tell her your name.

“Wh-What are you going to do with me ma’am?” You ask nervously.
13222.title: A middle-aged woman

choices: The woman reluctantly sells you to her
The woman is unmoved and leaves with you
13223.content:
You look up to see a girl who looks to be about 16 smiling down at you. She has long straight blond hair and blue eyes. She also wearing braces which are very noticeable whenever she smiles. She is also wearing a charm bracelet on her left wrist.

“He’s perfect!” she exclaims reaching for you.

Just then your captress closer her fist again. And put her hand behind her back. You are shocked by the sudden G-Force it causes.

“Not so fast. Where’s my money?” The woman insists.

“Oh yes. Here’s your $400,000” the girl says handing your captress a huge wad of cash.

“Jeez where does a teenage girl get that kind of money?” You think.

“Actually he’s $500,000” the giant woman says with you still clinched in her first.

“What?!” The girl says angrily. “You said he was $400,000!”

“Nope, I’m certain I said he was $500,000” the woman insisted. “I’m sorry but I can’t sell you him.”

“Please?!” She begged “if you don’t I’ll tell the police you deal shrunken men!”

What happens next?
13223.title: Not enough money

choices: Try to escape
Wait for the woman to get back.
Readers choice
132232.content:
“Ha!” Your captress laughs as she walks out the door. “Do you really think anyone would believe that? Now get out of here before I make you a playmate for the little man I have in my fist.”

Defeated and infuriated the girl slams the door. The woman then walks back to her car and drops you back in the same spot you where before.

“Well that didn’t work out.” The woman says casually as she starts her car and pulls out of the driveway. “Don’t worry little guy, I’ll find you another owner.”

“Or you could just unshrink me and let me go.” You say hopefully.

The woman laughs. “No way! You’re worth way too much to just let go. Sorry but you’re just going to have to face facts. You’re going to be some lucky woman’s pet, or slave, or whatever.”

“Or whatever?” you say in a concerned tone.

The woman simply ignores you. For the rest of the trip you can’t thinking about what she meant by that.

“Here we are.” she announces.

She scoops you up and carries you into her house. When she opens up her fist you look around and guess you are in her bedroom.

“This should hold you while I find a buyer” The woman says as she drops you in to a jar on her dresser. “That shouldn’t take too long, cute young ones like you always sell really fast. I’ll just write a description of you on my website and you’ll be on your way in no time” she says in peppy tone.

“Website?” You ask.

“Well of course, most tinies I sell are this way. There is no shortage of women who would love to have you. Especially you” she says winking at you. “That’s why I picked you. You’re the cutest one I’ve ever captured, you’ll make me a lot of money.”

The compliments she gives you are hollow in your mind. All you can think about is how you’re going to be sent to god knows where at the mercy of a strange woman who can do whatever she wants to you.

“I’ll see you later little man” the woman says as she walks out of her room.

What do you do next?
132232.title: Nice try

choices: Someone in town
Across the country
A foreign country
1322322.content:
There’s nothing you can do but sit in your glass prison. You’re too tiny to scale the walls or break the jar. Plus you don’t want to think about what this woman would do to you if she caught you trying to escape. You sit and try to come to terms with your fate. You start crying thinking about how your as it as been is over. You just feel hopeless and powerless to do anything.

After three hours the woman comes back with a smile one her face.

“Good news Little one!” she says in a sing songy voice holding the jar to her face. “I found a buyer for you! I told you it wouldn’t take long.”

Before you can think of what to do next her hand comes into the jar and plucks you out with her thumb and index finger. She holds you up to her face. Her face is all you can see. You can’t help but think about how small you really are.

“Here’s the deal little guy” begins the woman. “You’re being sent to...”
1322322.title: She found a buyer

choices: Gina shows you off to the rest of the sorority
Nobody's home so Gina prepares you for the arrival of her sorority sisters
One of Gina's friends shows up and asks what's in her hand
1323.content:
"A-a plaything?" you ask

"Yes" responds the woman. "You see, I'm the head of my sorority on campus and it's my job to find ways to get more pledges to be our sorority sisters. So I shrink cute guys such as yourself to attract more members, it's turned into a tradition to have a different shrunken man as our plaything each school year. Then at the end of the year he is given away to one of our graduating sisters as a graduation gift."

You sit in your cup holder, trying to take in everything. The last thing you want is to be shrunken and humiliated by a bunch of annoying sorority girls. You've always thought they were obnoxious.

"And don't worry little man, nobody is going to harm you. The girls are going to love you!" reassures your captress.

Your heart sinks, you just know that you're going to be humiliated. To you it's almost worse than the physical torture you thought you were going to have to endure when you first were kidnapped by this woman.

"I'm Gina by the way. What's yours?"

You say your name indignantly. "And you can't just kidnap me and make me a plaything for your sorority! I'm in college too and I have my own life!"

"Oh of course I can, you're in my cupholder aren't you?" giggles Gina. "I wonder if any of the girls will recognize you if you go to the college here in town, and don't worry you'll learn to love you're new life!"

Knowing that there's nothing you can do, you sit in the cup holder and try to convince yourself that it won't be as bad as you think it will be. Gina periodically smiles down at you, pleased with the catch that she made. After almost a half hour the car stops and Gina scoops you out and holds you in her open hand.

"Welcome to your new home" she says excitedly.

You look and see a house on campus with Greek letters above the door. Gina closes her fist and you're trapped in darkness again as Gina makes her way to the house.

What happens next?
1323.title: "A plaything for my soirity."

choices: Your captor drops you in the other woman’s  luggage.
The other woman scoops you up and traps you in her hand.
The other woman picks you up between her fingers.
133.content:
She puts her closed fist against her tummy and she starts walking. Every step she makes registers as loud booms in your tiny ears. She doesn’t hold you too tight and you can kind of make her out as she walks. You look up between her closed fingers you see that she looks like she’s in her late 20s and has long brown hair, she has average size breasts, she was also wearing a necklace that went just past her breasts, before she closed her hand on you you noticed she had big brown eyes, you also noticed her pale skin was flawless when she stared down at you, and she obviously uses some sort of lotion since the ride in her closed hand is soft and even somewhat pleasant.

After about five minutes of walking she stops.
“Did you get him?” Said a voice that sounded like it belonged to another woman.
“I sure did!” She said with excitement in her voice.

She opens up her hand revealing you in her palm. Before you can see who the other woman is...
133.title: She gives you to someone else.

choices: Jade checks her bag
Jade takes her bag onto her plane
Jade puts her bag in her car
1331.content:
“Good” the other woman says. “And he fits my exact specifications?”

“Yes Jade.” Your original captor says confidently. “I really couldn’t believe my luck when I saw him.”

“Perfect. Good work Emily!” Jade says with excitement in her voice. “Here’s your payment. Now put him in here before someone sees what we’re doing.”

Suddenly you feel Emily’s hand move and drop you into some place dark. You free fall and land on a soft surface. You look up just in time to see a sliver of light before you see someone’s hand zip you up.

You feel where you are and you soon realize you’re on someone’s clothes. You move around a little and bump into what felt like a bra. Your heart sinks as you realize you’re in some woman’s luggage! You assume that it must be that woman named Jade’s luggage based on the conversation you heard.

Suddenly you feel a jolt and the sound of wheels on a hard surface and the steps of the two women walking. You know for sure you’re in a suitcase now. You can hear the muffled voices of the two women responsible for your kidnapping. Eventually the talking stops and you can hear a pair of footsteps getting fainter and fainter.

“Emily must be gone” you say to yourself.

You figure all you can do now if plot a potential escape attempt and wonder what this Jade wants with you and wonder why she wanted someone who looks like you.

What happens next?
1331.title: Carried away

choices: She takes you out.
She just does her business and goes on her way.
Something else, like maybe someone steals her luggage (use your imagination)
13312.content:
The world moves as she wheels the suitcase you’re in throughout the airport. The thunderous clank from her heeled shoes announce each of her steps. You hear the familiar scanning noises as she goes through security. For some reason, they don’t seem to notice you at all: maybe they think you’re some kind of doll or toy from the sensors.

You hear her buy some lunch at the food court and head over to her gate. She’s taken a detour in the bathroom, and you hear her open and close the stall door.
13312.title: Carry-On

choices: Rich and can afford some fun.”
A dealer: transporting you for someone else.”
A model, specializing in a certain kind of apparel.”
133121.content:
You hear an unzipping noise, and light floods your world. A hand reaches straight for you. You instinctively try to dive into the bra next to you to hide, but you’re not quick enough. It grabs you by your leg and dangles you outside.

Once outside, her fingers places you onto the palm of her other hand and lifts you to her face. In front of you is a tall and skinny black woman. She has medium length braided hair, up in a bun on top of her head. She’s absolutely gorgeous. You know she can’t mean well because she’s kidnapped you, but in another setting, you’d find her incredibly attractive. She’s sitting on the toilet, but you can tell by the fact that her pants are up, that she didn’t have to go.

“Hello, I’m Jade,” she introduces. “I figured I would take a better look at you where no one else would see us.”

“Where am I, and why am I so small?” you demand.

“Hmm, I guess it makes sense that you’re getting used to this situation,” she bemuses. “I’m…
133121.title: Acquainted

choices: Try to escape.
Wait it out.
Try to get help from someone (like do you have your phone?)
1331213.content:
“Hmm, I guess it makes sense that you’re getting used to this situation,” Jade bemuses. “I’m a model, specializing in a certain kind of apparel. I need tiny people with a certain look and feel to match my outfits. I sent one of my assistants to find someone at the airport, and you, young sir,” poking you playfully with her index finger while saying this and inadvertently knocking you over not knowing her strength, “will match the ensemble perfectly.”

“Ensemble?” you reply, too dumbfounded by the rest of her statement to make sense of it yet.

“Yes, you’ll see in time. Don’t worry.” She continues. “You’ve already got acquainted with some of it.” She points to the clothes in her luggage, and you notice that the clothes you’ve been lying on top of are ornate clothing items.

“We’re headed back to New York for the shoot.”

“New York? Why did you come here to find someone then?” you ask.

“Oh I have to do a lot of travel for work, and well, it’s best not to shrink people in the same city, since it’s easier to track then.”

“You’ve got to let me go. I have a life!” you demand back.

“I guess you did, but don’t worry,” she responds. “I need you. Plus, even if I didn’t, I can’t be implicated by having you go free: I’d have to dispose of you to cover my tracks.”

“Wait, is that what you want to do with when you’re done?” you stammer.

“Oh don’t worry. A fine fellow like you, I’ll need for a while. We’ll cross that bridge if we ever get to it,” she explains, winking. “But don’t worry about that. I took you out to give you some food. It’s going to be a long flight. Take this for now.”

She hands you a grape and small piece of cheese from her lunch: some kind of Greek salad. The weight of the grape almost knocks you over, but you can tell she’s waiting for you to eat in her presence. You hesitantly do: the grape squirts in your face when you first dig your face into it. This causes her to giggle and shake her hand slightly. You only eat half of each. She immediately grabs the rest of the grape and cheese and plop it into her mouth. You wince as she chews something about the size of your head like it wasn’t a thing.

After you’re done, she places you back into the cup of her bra in her suitcase and zips it back up.

“Enjoy the flight, and I’ll see you in a few hours,” she calls as she zips it up. You hear her get up and walk to her flight, trapped amidst the folds of her clothes.
1331213.title: Fashion Item

choices: Yes, the hole is on the bottom
No, it's on the top.
13312131.content:
You feel a sudden jolt as Jade exits the bathroom and makes her way to her gate. You can hear every step her high heels makes and by the looks of things, she seems to be in a hurry. Right away your mind turns to escaping. You have no idea what a fashion model wants with a shrunken man, and you really don't want to find out. Luckily for you, Jade put you in a bag that rolls on the floor so it's easy for you to stumble through the bag and find the zipper without being jostled about. After finding it, you push with all your might trying to make even the tiniest hole to squeeze through. Finally, the zipper budges just enough to make a hole just large enough to squeeze through. You hope that the hole is on the bottom of the suitcase so you can just jump on to the ground and make a hasty escape.

Is luck still on your side?
13312131.title: Escaping from the model

choices: Risk it now
Wait until a safer moment
133121311.content:
You smile triumphantly seeing the ground is only inches away from you. However, it's a short lived victory as you quickly realize you have another problem, Jade is walking way too fast for you to get out safely. Still hearing the footsteps of her massive high heels, you notice that's she practically jogging now. You figure that she must be late for her flight.

Your suspicions are confirmed when you hear: "Final boarding call for Delta flight 199 with service to New York JFK" over the intercom.

You quickly realize that you have only two options at this point. You think about jumping now and hope you don't die from hitting the ground from a fast moving bag, but you know that if you succeed there's almost no chance Jade will realize you're gone until it's too late for her to recapture you. You also think about the option of waiting until Jade stops moving so fast and escape then, but with the last call announcement you know that there is probably no line at the gate and assume that the next time she'll stop will be on the plane. Your heart sinks knowing that option is also risky. It would be safer but Jade could put her bag in the over head bin or see you escape more easily.

You don't have much time to mull so you quickly decide to...
133121311.title: Yes, the hole is on the bottom

choices: You land in New York without incident
Jade takes you out of her suitcase mid flight
You are startled by sudden movement
13312132.content:
You hear the suitcase roll on the floor and the loud booms that Jade makes with every step in her high heels. You hear her humming a tune to herself as you are carried away from your previous life to an uncertain fate. After about five minutes, the rolling stops as Jade makes it to her gate. You can hear the boarding call for her flight to New York. She seemed to have timed her arrival perfectly to her gate.

Before long Jade makes it to her plane. You feel a sudden shift as she puts her suitcase into the overhead bin. Your heart sinks as you hear the door to the bin shut. You know there’s no escape now. All you can do is wait.

You hear the flight attendant giving safety instructions for the flight. You soon hear the sound of the aircraft’s powerful jets lifting the plane into the air. You can’t help but be terrified. You’ve been kidnapped by a model who wants to use you for god knows what.

You keep wondering what she meant by you “fitting in to her ensemble”. You figure it can’t mean anything good. Especially since Jade has no intention of letting you go.

You figure you’ll find out soon enough. In the meantime you try to collect yourself and get some rest.


What happens next?
13312132.title: Wait it out.

choices: Jade takes you out of the bag
Jade meets a friend at the airport
Jade gets into a taxi and goes to the studio
133121321.content:
Jade was right, it is going to be a long flight. New York was on the opposite side of the country from where you were supposed to be flying. Luckily for you Jade’s clothes in her suitcase are soft. You easily make an improvised bed and pillow and try to relax. Despite all the chaos that just happened, you fall asleep.

You dream that you are normal size again and you’re attending your college graduation which is expected to be in a few months. You’re so excited to get your diploma and start your new life as a college graduate. Just as the president of the University is about to hand you your diploma your vision goes black.

Sure enough, you wake up and you’re in pitch blackness again. The aircraft had landed in New York and the sudden jolt of Jade grabbing her suitcase ruined the wonderful dream you were having.

You’re snapped back into reality and fear begins to set in as Jade takes her luggage and starts carrying you through the airport. You’re absolutely petrified thinking about what’s going to happen next and how you’re going to be used by this model.

What happens next?
133121321.title: You land in New York without incident

choices: It's a night shoot so you don't have time to relax
Early wakeup call but for now you can rest...
Someone knocks on the suite's door
1331213211.content:
You are still trapped in the piles of clothes crammed into her suitcase when the nauseating motion of being wheeled around comes to an abrupt stop. Worse ride ever, you think to yourself. You untie your leg that is wrapped around a bra strap and you're thankful the clothes are freshly washed at least.

The bag begins to unzip again and light comes into your dark tomb. A manicured hand comes inside aiming right for you and grabs you with no struggle. Jade holds you in her fist as she says goodbye to her chauffeur and you bounce around her palm. There is a loud thud as she passes her suitcase onto someone else and it sounds like there are hundreds of voices in different languages from outside your new prison of the supermodel's sweaty palm.

Her heels begin to click again onto a hard floor, an elevator and are muffled by what sounds like a carpeted floor. You hear the sound of her mumbling numbers and pressing the buttons on a keypad. All this traveling, you think, she must be getting close to her destination. You can't take much more of this being dragged around like a keychain!

Jade yawns and her palm opens suddenly, dropping you onto a nightstand in what looks like a dimly lit hotel suite. You've never been in a 5 star room before so you take a moment to admire the sleek modern look of the place before Jade bends her body and fills your view with her attractive sinister smile.

"You did a good job traveling, little guy. Nice to know I can just scoop you up without getting too much trouble from you."

The supermodel pops off her high heel and sighs, laying onto the bed. The cozy mattress is silent to normal ears but at your size, you hear the material taking in the giantess model's body and the impact makes you fall back a little. Jade begins to untangle the braided portion of her hair to let it fall down her shoulders.

"We're mostly here for work but if you're good, I can make this trip very enjoyable for you!" Jade grins.

"What do you need me to do?" You say with some dread in your voice.

Ending up with a hot supermodel while she works isn't what you had in mind for a vacation but it is better than trying to survive being stepped on in a busy airport.
1331213211.title: Model Behavior

choices: Your girlfriend Lizzie
Airport police
Jade takes you out again before you can make a call
13312133.content:
You don’t really know what Jade meant by making you apart of her ensemble but you don’t want to find you. Hoping that your cellphone shrunk along with the rest of you you reach into your pocket.

As luck would have it your phone shrunk too. You know you don’t have much time before Jade gets on her plane and you won’t be able to call for help. You dial the first number that comes to mind.

What number is it?
13312133.title: A sliver of hope

choices: She believes you
She knows, and she’s in on it
She thinks it’s a joke.
133121331.content:
You met Lizzie during this school year. You’ve only been dating for five months but she’s as never let you down before. You figure she’d be the best person to call, she’s the one who dropped you off so chances are she’s the closest one to the airport out of all the people you know.

You press her number on your list of contacts and wait for her to pick up.

“Hi sweetie” you hear her say. “Did you make it on your flight yet?”

“Not exactly” you say quietly. “I know this will sound crazy but shortly after you dropped me off some strange woman shrunk me and handed me off to her friend who’s a model! She said she wants to use me in a photo shoot but she also plans to not let me go. So, I've been kidnapped and I’m in her luggage and she’s walking to her plane which is probably heading to New York! Please honey, you have to help me!”

How does Lizzie respond?
133121331.title: Your girlfriend Lizzie

choices: They believe you
They think it’s a prank call
133121332.content:
You immediately think of the airport police. They always have safety announcements over the intercom every ten minutes with their phone number to report suspicious activity. You dial the number as fast as you can and impatiently wait for someone to pick up as you’re carried through the airport.

“Port of Portland Police” you hear after what seems like forever.

“You have to help me!” You say quietly so Jade can’t hear you. “I was shrunk by some woman and handed off to a model who kidnapped me for some sort of photo shoot. I’m in her luggage and she’s probably on her way to a flight heading for New York! Please help!”

There’s a moment of silence and the person on the other line finally speaks.

What do they say?
133121332.title: Airport police

The other woman scoops you up in her hand before you have a chance to get a good look at her. She presses you snuggly against her palm, enough to immobilize you but not enough to hurt you.

“Thank you,” she tells your initial captor. “Don’t ever open palm him in public like that. You never know who might see him, or what he might see.”

“Sorry,” the other woman replies.

“I understand,” your first captress replies.

“I don’t think you understand how risky that was. Now, if he ever talks to police authorities, he may be able to identify your face and trace the connection to us. It puts the whole operation in jeopardy.”

“I am sorry.”

“What the fuck!” she exclaims as she diminishes in size.

She grabs the little woman with her other hand and decides what to do next.

1332112.content:
She drops both of you into a shoe-box size crate, closing it before you can see anyone. Some light comes in, and you notice a fabric bed, a piece of food, and a thimble for a toilet. You don’t have time to inspect any of these as the box starts to move.

“Add one more woman shrinkee to the order,” your captress states to someone you can’t see. “One less person to shrink before we get going.”

Someone carries the box and drops it harshly onto a pallet, causing your world to quake.

You turn to the woman, “Who are you, and what the fuck is happening?”

“We shrink people to sell on the black market. Very lucrative money.”

You are enraged at what she did to you and your current situation, but almost too angry to do anything but ask questions.

“Who do you sell shrunken people to?”

“Mostly to establishments around the world that cater to uhh tiny demands,” she states processing this herself. She never had to think about the operation from the perspective of the caged.

“Establishments?”

“Yeah, they rent out little people to use as toys.”

“Are you saying that we are going to one of these?”

“Well sometimes, rich individuals also order some shrinkees for their personal collections, but usually it’s to one these establishments.”

“You bitch,” you shout, jumping on top of her, but she seems to know some kind of martial arts and repels you back.

“Where is this shipment going?” You eventually ask.

“I don’t know. I was only a collector. I didn’t oversee shipments. They delineate the tasks so that if I became compromised, I couldn’t give away key information.”

You sulk trying to decide what to do. A few more boxes land on top of you causing your world to shake. Eventually, they seat the pallet leaving you in darkness.

You hear engine noises as your capture is in a car. You can hear her get out, pay a taxi driver in an unknown language, and walk down the street. Your heart sinks. Wherever you are now, they must not speak English.

You hear the woman walk into a building and get onto an elevator, her heels clacking against the hard floor. After a few second ride, she walks through a hallway, opens a door, and eventually plops what sounds like a large mattress.

She reaches for the pocket button above you and grabs you. Light floods your eyes as she lifts and plops you onto her lap. You look up to see a giant woman smiling down at you.

You stare at the woman in front of you. She looks to be in her late 30s, with long curly hair and olive skin. You can tell she’s of Middle Eastern descent. She was wearing suit jacket and brandy shirt. You can tell from her clothes alone that she is both a business woman and incredibly wealthy.

She coos down at you playfully, but in a language you never heard and starts petting your head and hair. You curl backwards in shock, but you quickly realize that standing on her legs, you really have nowhere to go. She laughs and whispers something you don’t understand, winking.

With that there’s a knock on the door. Her legs instantly move to the edge of the bed, knocking you off in the process. Luckily you only land on the soft bed. Just as you get to your feet, she stands up as well, her body shifting the weight on the bed and knocking you back down. She walks over to get the door.

This gives you some time to look around and see what kind of room you are in.

You can tell that you are in a highend apartment. You can see pictures of her and what looks like her family on the wall. A giant window gives a breathtaking view of a city, on the horizon of which you notice an ocean and a desert. Putting two and two together, you realize that you’re in Abu Dhabi in the UAE.

Outside her door stood a servant who loaded all her baggage and seems ready to put it away. Your captress gives her some directions but seems insistent about not letting her into her bedroom. The servant leaves.

If she has a servant like this, she must be loaded.

The woman whisks back around and walks directly towards you…

13321121222111.content:
You see the woman smiling as her massive hand reaches for you. Soon you feel her long, warm fingers wrap around your body and hoist you into the air. Your captress holds you up to her face as she sits back down on her bed. She starts speaking to you in a foreign language again, while wiggling her finger in front of you. Judging by the tone of voice she's using, you assume that she's saying some cutesy things to you. Your suspicions are somewhat confirmed when she places you on her open palm and her lips pucker. As you anticipated she moves closer and closer to you until she plants a big wet kiss on your tiny body. She kisses you multiple times until she finally relents. You're covered in a thin layer of the woman's saliva. Noticing this, the woman giggles and and blows on you, trying to dry you off.

You smile nervously at her, you are glad she seems nice but you are embarrassed at being treating like a pet. You sit down in her open palm waiting for her to make the next move. Seemingly amused by your gesture she sets you down on her upper leg you starts to pet you on your head with her finger, cooing at you in the same language as before.

Suddenly you hear the woman say: "Tabitha". You look up and see your smiling captress pointing at herself.

"That must be her name" you say to yourself.

You look up at her, point at yourself, and say your name. Tabitha smiles and continues petting you and sweetly talking to you. It was starting to drive you crazy that you couldn't understand what she was saying. You wish that she could speak English so you could know what she was saying.

After fawning over you for a good long while, Tabitha gently picks you up between her fingers and sets you on her bed before getting up. She walks into the other room leaving you on the bed. You wonder if you'll finally see what she wants with you. When she comes back you realize you're about to get your answer.

What happens next?

13321121222112.content:
The woman continues to smile at you for a moment until there's buzzing sound. The noise startles you, but the woman acts like she was expecting it. You quickly realize it was coming from an intercom type device located near the door of the woman's apartment. The woman holds her open palm in front of you and says something to you in a foreign language while pointing at her palm. Guessing what she means, you step onto her open palm. The woman smiles down at you and she carefully lifts you up in her palm and walks towards the buzzer.

She pushes a button on the intercom and begins to talk into it while holding you. You can hear another woman's voice coming from the other end. By the sound of it, both of the women sound very excited in their brief conversation. After 30 seconds, your captress pushes the same button and walks back over where she was sitting with you. She pets you up and down your back with her finger while saying things to you in a language you can't understand in a cutesy tone.

Suddenly the door opens and you see a woman with olive colored skin, long black curly hair, and big brown eyes. She looks to be in her late 20s and has c cup breasts. She's dressed more casually than her counterpart. She's wearing designer boots, a skirt, and t-shirt. Your captress gently sets you down on the coffee table, gets up, and gives the woman a big hug. The two converse in a foreign language for a few minutes. Then both women turn their attention to you. Your captress picks you up and holds you in her cupped hands in front of the other woman's face. The woman squeals in excitement and smiles at you while talking to your captress, still in a language you can't understand.

What happens next?

13321121222113.content:
She cusps you in her hands and walks you into the hallway. You marvel at the decadent apartment, pretty spacious for clearly being in the heart of the city. She takes you down a set of stairs (yes, her apartment has a few stories to it) and into a room with a feel like a finished basement.

She plops you onto a large table, calling around the room for others you cannot see. Immediately several other tiny people come out of various crannies and whip into action. She barks some orders to them in a language you’ve never heard and leaves.

A few of the tinies approach you, their newest compadre.

133211212221132.content:
You look around frazzled. Your mind is processing so much right now, it feels like you’re about to have a panic attack.

“Hello,” calls a calm voice in front of you. English! You dart in its direction.

“Oh hey, I’m here to help,” it says. It’s a black woman, also your size speaking in a West African accent. “I know this is a lot to take in.”

“Where am I? Who are you?” you manage to let out. “And who is she?”

“I am Adaeze,” she explains. “She is Tabitha, a rich oil tycoon. I guess many of the super wealthy have eccentric hobbies, and well, we’re hers.”

You back away as she walks up.

“What do you mean by that?” you exclaim.

“She likes to build a little community for herself, and that’s what we are,” Adaeze answers. “She likes to collect a tiny souvenir from each country her company does business with. She’s constructed a tiny town for us.”

“What does she do with you guys?”

“Well, she mostly lives her life out there I guess, but during her free time she likes to come down to watch us, sometimes play a few games, do some chores, or show us off to her friends and family.”

“Why did she pick me?”

“You mean you’re pets?!” you exclaim.

“Well yes, there isn’t much we can do, so we try to make the best of it.”

You can’t believe this. Your mind is raising processing all of this.

“Hey, this is a lot to take in. Let’s sit you down.”

She steps closer to you, urging you to get lower to the ground. You don’t feel so good.

"Who is that?" you ask

"I believe she is one of Tabitha's servants" Adaeze replies. "But I don't know why she's down here. Tabatha doesn't allow her servants to be anywhere near us."

The giant woman makes her way over to where you and the other tinies are. She towers over you as she scans the floor looking at each and every one of the tinies. There are over thirty tiny people and she looks over every one. You and the other tinies look up at her, wondering what she's doing. You run as fast as your little legs can carry you, but it's no use. The woman's hand closes in on you and you're scooped up into her palm. The woman quickly cups you between her two hands and hastily leaves the basement. You're jostled around in the woman's hands as she leaves Tabitha's apartment and heads down the stairs of the building. She's clearly trying to get as much space between you two and her boss as she can. You can't believe what's happening, just as you were trying to process being the newest pet of some rich oil tycoon you get re-kidnapped and have to once again go through the anxiety of wondering what's going to happen to you.

133211212221132321.title: In the hands of a servant

choices: You're in an airplane cargo hold

133211213.content:
The woman walks over to you and sits next to you.

"Look, I know I'm the one that got you into this mess." the woman says to you. "But our best shot at getting out of this is to work together."

"Why should I trust you?" you ask, still angry.

"Because I want to get out of this as much as you do, and logically speaking I have nothing to gain from betraying you." the woman responds as a matter of factly. "No doubt my boss will alert the higher ups of my mistake and will want nothing more to do with me, so I can't make any money off you. So truce?"

You realize that she has a point and you begrudgingly look up at her.

"All right, truce." you say reluctantly.

"Excellent. My name is Emily by the way. What's yours?"

You tell her your name.

"That's a nice name, now let's find a way to get out of here. We don't have much time, it won't be long until we are loaded onto a plane and sent to God knows where"

"I think I may have an idea" you say.

"What is it?" Emily asks.

"When you shrunk me, everything in my pocket shrank too including my keys. I may be able to use one as a saw"

Emily goes over to the wall to feel the material.

"It's made of cardboard!" she exclaims. "Man, they must not be a smart as I thought"

With no time to lose, you run over to the wall and start sawing away with your house key as Emily cheers you on. After what seems like no time, you saw a hole right through your container. Light rushes in as you and Emily take your first breath of freedom that you two had for what seemed like forever. You're so happy that you've found a way out that you forget to be cross at Emily.

"Let's get out of here" you say to her

You two take each other's hands and jump out of the box. You both land on a hard floor and you both take a look around at your surroundings.

"Where are we?" Emily asks out loud.

You look around and realize that

Now I have some finishing up to do with this shipment so you can wait in hear while I finish up, don't worry we can have some real fun once I get home" you can hear your original captress pleading.

133212.content:
“I will have to give you to him since you’re the only person he’s seen.” the woman says
“Really??” your first captress says with obvious excitement in her voice. “What do you want me to do with him?”
“Do whatever you want with him as long as he doesn’t escape.” Your second captress instructs “if he escapes I will hold you responsible”
“Don’t worry” your first captress assures “I’ve always wanted my own tiny man, especially one as cute as him. He’s not going anywhere”
“Good, he’s all yours. Now I better leave and try to capture some more shrinkees since we can’t sell this one.” With that, the woman drops you back into your first captresses hand and walks away.
The woman who originally caught you closes her hand and drops you in her purse. She doesn’t want to risk anyone seeing you. She zips up her purse but leaves it a tiny bit open to allow fresh air in and she starts walking. Inside her purse you try not do get crushed by her makeup and her wallet. Eventually, you find a nice piece of cloth to lay on that isn’t in the direct path of anything that could crush you.

As the woman keeps walking you realize you’re leaving the airport. You hear her getting into her car. She sets her purse down on the passgener seat. As she drives you can’t help but worry about what’s going to happen to you. She seemed pretty excited to have possession of you and said that she wanted to keep you. So you were relieved that she probably wasn’t going to kill you. Still, you wondered what she meant by always wanting a tiny man. You hoped that she didn’t have any menevolent plans for you.

Eventually, after about 30 minutes of driving the car stopped and you felt the sudden motion of the woman picking up her purse with you inside. After you feel the purse being set down on a hard surface a sudden rush of light comes in as she unzips it. She looks down into her purse and sees you. A sweet smile comes across her face as she reaches in to grab you. Her giant fingers wrap around you and scoop you up in her hand again. When she opens her hand you’re somewhat startled to be looking straight at her giant face. She cups you in her hands and smiles down at her captive.
“Well hello there, cutie.” she said “did you enjoy the ride in my purse? I hope it wasn’t too uncomfortable”
“Y-yes, it was fine” you say still intimated by her size.
“Good, I would have hated for you to be crushed by my makeup” she said with a playful wink. “Do you have a name little guy?”
You tell her your name and she continues smiling at you in her cupped hands
“My name is Emily” she said with peppy voice
“Well Emily, can you tell me why you shrunk me and what is going to happen to me?”
“Well, I’m part of an organization who shrinks people to sell on the black market usually to facilitaties where people can rent tiny people as toys or to private collectors. However, since I let you see my face when I caught you, my boss said we couldn’t sell you because you’re not supposed to see who captured you. Because of this my boss told me that I could have you. I have to admit, I did that on purpose because you were just so cute and I wanted you for myself.” With that she gave you a playful poke.

Trying to comprehend all what she just told you you managed to say in a nervious voice “w-what are you going to do to me?”

“Well...” Emily started to say in a flirtatious tone “I was thinking you could be my...”
133212.title: Gifted to your original captress

choices: Emily giggled as she patted her stomach, she loves it when they struggle
Emily felt vomitting, she wasn't accustomed to her food violently rebelling
1332123.content: And with that Emily raised you above her head, she opened her mouth and shook you playfully as she dangled you over her gaping maw. Your jaw dropped, you had been afraid of what the giantess could do to you but it had never occurred to you that she'd actually eat you. You opened your mouth to beg but just as you did Emily's grip on you released and you plummeted downward. With a wet smack you slammed onto her massive tongue, you scrambled to escape her mouth but her lips slammed shut in front of you. The massive tongue rose up beneath you and you heard Emily moan in pleasure as she thoroughly tasted you and tossed you around her mouth with her tongue. You don't know how long it was that Emily's tongue manhandled you around her mouth for her pleasure, but it did eventually come to an end. The tongue slammed you against the top of the giantess's mouth and slid you into the waiting abyss of her throat. You were drawn into her throat, kneaded downwards by her muscles. After a journey that certainly felt much longer than it must have actually been you plopped out of her constricting throat and into her stomach. It was pitch black but you could feel the fleshy walls and ceiling of your living prison, soon to be tomb. You threw yourself at a nearby wall, screaming and thrashing. As you did so...

13321231.content:
“Hee hee, that tickles!” Emily giggles as she pats her stomach. In horror you realize that to her, you fighting for your life just registers as a satisfying tickle. You then feel slight pressure coming from outside Emily’s stomach. You realize she’s gleefully rubbing it. She’s really enjoying your struggle.

After about 10 minutes of struggling you start to feel weak. All you can do is just sit in Emily’s stomach and gradually lose your energy as her stomach acid gradually sucks the life out of you.

“He was so tasty!” you hear Emily say. She then lets out a petite burp and continues with her day.

You meanwhile, lose consciousness after about an hour. You don’t know it at the time but you will never wake up again. Emily’s stomach acids begin to dissolve your body and you slowly start getting digested. You then become nothing more than nutrients for Emily’s body as your remains make their way through her small intestine and bloodstream.

Meanwhile as you are being digested. Emily met up with her friend that had scolded her earlier.

“So what did you do to him?” she asked.

“He’s in my stomach now if you want to say hello” she said with satisfied smile.

“Good Thinking!” Her friend said. “Now there are no witnesses to our operation”

“Yes, plus he was the tastiest little thing I’ve ever eaten!” Emily said joyfully. “You should give me shrinkees more often”

The two women laughed and walked off together.

A few days pass and you are fully digested. The only evidence that you ever existed is a piece of fat on Emily’s tummy.

Suddenly, the woman opens her hand and drops you into her back pocket. You are snug up against the woman’s butt, but not too much to where it hurts.

You figure that whoever the other woman is she has a nice round butt given the motion of her walking. You can hear the muffled voices of the two giantesses as you are taken away, you can’t make out what they’re saying but you’re pretty sure it’s about you.

After about five minutes the two stop and see a giant hand reach down into the pocket and grab you. You are brought up to the face of woman you were given too. You realize you’re in the bathroom

The woman’s eyes are a dark blue, she has long wavy red hair, and a round face. You assume she’s also in her late 20s. You look to see the two woman staring at you and smiling.

She brings you close to her eyes and carefully examines you.

What does the woman say next?

133221.content:
“He’s perfect!” she says. “Nice work Emily.”

“Thank you Kathleen” replies Emily.

“Excuse me!” You shout. “What the hell is going on here? Why did she shrink me?!”

“Oh, I’m sorry little guy.” Kathleen said focusing her attention back to you. “Where’s our manners? I am Kathleen and this is Emily. To answer your question, Emily shrunk you so you can be sold to someone who lives in the place where taking out latest vacation at.” Kathleen said as a matter of factly.

“What the hell do you mean you’re going to sell me?” You say with a noticeably more scared tone than before.

“It’s quite simple really.” Explains Emily. “Kathleen and I love to go on vacation to places that are normally too expensive for us. So to finance our vacations we run a little business on the side in which we find customers who want their own shrunken person who happens to live in the place we want to go. They describe what they want and we shrink and capture the person who fits their description. And you..” she pauses to poke you unintentionally knocking you over in her friends palm. “Fit our buyer’s specifications to a T!”

“You can’t do this” You say still trying to sound assertive. “I’m a human being!”

“Well, I guess you were” Kathleen states. “Now you’re our latest product. Don’t worry though, our customer sounds like a really nice woman.”

“What’s she doing to do with me?” You ask.

“We don’t know. That’s up to her.” Emily shrugs. “Whatever she wants I guess.”

You gulp in fear as you hear those words.

“Where exactly are taking me?” You ask nervously.

“You’ll find out soon enough” Kathleen said smugly grinning at you. “Right now Emily and I have to catch our flight. You get to ride in...”

You see Emily smile as she unzips her large bag.

“You can’t just..!”

Before you can finish your sentence you are dropped into Emily’s luggage and zipped up. You land on some soft material which you assume are clothes. You gulp in fear as you hear one of them put a lock on it.

There’s a sudden shift as you are put on a conveyer belt. Gradually their voices get softer and softer and all your left with is the sound of the conveyer belt moving you through the airport.

Knowing that airport security scans all checked bags before being loaded onto the plane you jump up and down and wave your arms around hoping to be noticed when you hear the voices of airport security scanning bags with their x-ray.

Are you noticed?

You’re heart sinks as the voices get fainter and fainter. You sadly sit on the pile of clothes in the bag thinking about how that was your only chance of being rescued. Soon you’re being taken out to the aircraft and you feel a sudden change in angles as you’re loaded into the plane’s cargo hold.

Even more so, you wonder in fear where you’re being taken to.

After a while you realize that whoever you’re being sold to lives really far away as the flight is already over six hours long. With nothing to do but wait you try to get some sleep. After another hour you eventually doze off.

After what didn’t seem like a long time you are woken up by a sudden thud. You soon realize that you’ve landed. Feeling nervous about your inevitable fate you quiver in fear as you hear baggage handlers removing bags from the plane.

It isn’t long until they get to your bag and you’re hoisted onto a truck bound for the baggage claim. You feel your world shift once again as you are placed on another conveyor belt which you assume is the baggage claim.

You realize that you guessed correctly when you hear the familiar muffled voices of Kathleen and Emily. There’s a sudden jolt as Emily grabs her suitcase off the conveyor belt. As you’re being carried through the airport you can hear the loud booms of Emily’s and Kathleen’s footsteps.

Suddenly, you hear a loud speaker in another language. You’ve always been good with languages and dialects and you realize you’re in...

134.content:
You take a good look at the giant woman who shrank you from in her hand, even with her fist closed. The woman looked like she was in her late 20s and had bright blood red hair. She wore a pair of blue sunglasses and had a tattoo of some sort over her left eye. She was also very fat, you'd say at least 400lbs with a bulging belly that made her pink tank top look painted on and a massive butt that looked as wide as she was tall and was covered in black pants. The giantess takes you to a corner where nobody could see either of you and opens her hand as she smiles down at the inch high shrunken man. "Fee-Fi-Fo-Fum." She says with a giggle. You look at her and groan. "Sorry," says the fat giantess. "Couldn't resist." "Why are you doing this to me?" you ask. You then grunt because the giantess puts one of her fingers over your mouth and smirks as she wiggles her big butt.

"Uh, uh, uh," says the giant redhead. "I'll tell you in due time. But first we have to get to our spot. The giantess reveals that she has several purple and polka-dotted carry-on bags and giggles as she lifts one up and unzips it. You look in worry and then the giant lady tilts her hand, causing you to slip and fall screaming into the bag. You land with a grunt on several shirts that looked too tight to fit on this giant lady and look up to see nothing but her smug face looking down on you.

After you've fallen into her carry-on bag, the giantess zips you in and takes her luggage away as she hums to herself. You look around the mess of clothes and see that with the place zipped up, it's almost too dark to see. You can see several books the woman brought, all of which by big name authors as well as what looks like a rather large makeup kit. What you don't see is anything that could've been used to shrink you. You're guessing that she most likely wouldn't keep it in the same place she would keep a shrunken victim, if she even still had it on her.

Suddenly you feel motion and hold on tight to one of the giantess's shirts as the carry-on bag you're on is placed with the others on a cart. You hear rolling and gulp before the luggage is put away in the cargo hold of the giant woman's plane. It isn't long before you hear an engine sound and the plane takes off. You've rode in planes before but always as a passenger. It was a scary thought that you were an inch tall and riding in a giant woman's suitcase. Speaking of which, that obese scarlet-haired giant was already in her seat (or rather both her seats given how large she was) and calmly listening to headphones as she is no doubt thinking on what she's going to do with you next.

As you wait in the bag with the giant woman's clothes, you begin to wonder to yourself "This woman shrank me," you think. "A total stranger, yet that big cow shrank me so small she could carry a dozen of me in her mouth. But why did she do it? Heck, how did she shrink me? Who is this giantess?" You sit down on a novel that had to weigh as much as a phonebook and think of three possibilities on who this monstrous behemoth lady was and what she wanted with you.

"Maybe this woman is a witch," you think to yourself. "Maybe she's a sorceress, perhaps hundreds of years old, who shrank me with a powerful magic spell. Oh my. If she is a witch and she's that powerful, maybe I'm not the first of her victims. For all I know, she could have dozens of shrunken victims in her other suitcases." You shiver at that idea but then you come up with another possibility.

"But on the opposite end of the spectrum," you think. "That soda I drank earlier tasted funny. Maybe that woman is a mad scientist who created some kind of strange formula meant to turn people like me into insects. Maybe she needed to make sure that it worked and used me as a guinea pig as a plot to take over the world. Oh, I hope that isn't the case." You kick back and suck your thumb just thinking about the red-haired giantess laughing as she stomped an entire city, dressed as a queen. "That would be horrible," you say to yourself. "I hope I'm not right about that theory."

Suddenly a spark came to you. "I did see that giantess wearing a bunch of jewelry. She could be rich. That's it. This giant woman who shrank me, could very well be a wealthy businesswoman. Maybe she runs a big company that just developed a shrinking ray and she chose me to test it out on! That's it. Maybe she's gone into the business of selling shrunken humans, developing shrinking technology for warfare or maybe she's simply planning to shrink all her employees to save on costs." You bite your nails. None of the possibilities of who this strange giantess was or how she shrank you sounded pleasant to you and you were afraid of what the giant fat lady was going to do to you when she arrived. You worry so much that you scream and pass out.

By the time you wake you, you hear that the plane has landed and then you gulp as the giant fat redhead lady was walking up to pick up her luggage with you inside. Unbeknownst to you, you were now in...

1341.content:
You feel a sudden jolt, realizing that the fat giantess has grabbed her bag. You quiver in fear as you are carried out of the airport to an uncertain fate. Suddenly, the ground changes angles and you are buried in the woman's plus-sized clothing. You quickly deduce you're being put into the trunk of a car when you hear a loud thud from above you.

You hear the engine of the car roar as you leave the airport. After 20 minutes you feel the car come to a stop and hear the trunk open. Still trapped underneath the fat woman's clothing, you feel a jolt as you're carried out of what you assume is a taxi. After what seems like 10 minutes you feel a slight thud as the woman sets her bag down on a seemingly soft surface.

Suddenly you hear the bag unzip, but your vision is still impaired thanks to being buried under the contents of the bag.

"Yoo-hoo! Where are you little guy?" the giantess says tauntingly.

You lay still, refusing to present yourself to her. The woman begins to dig through the bag, looking for you.

"Oh there you are!" She says, scooping you up in her cubby hand.

The woman recklessly sits down on the bed. You can help but notice the nose the bed makes when she plops down. You swear the bed is about to break. The woman opens up her hand and you realize you're in a luxurious hotel room with an incredible view of the ocean. You almost forget you're a tiny captive of an obese giantess as you take in the beautiful view.

"Welcome to Hawaii little guy!" says the woman in a cheerful tone. "If you're done looking at the view then perhaps we can do some proper introductions."

Her words snap you back into reality and you remember that you're a tiny captive at the mercy of a woman with unclear intentions. You turn around to see the woman's billboard size face smiling at you as she holds you close to her mouth.

"My name is Zoey, what's yours?" the woman asks

The woman's hot breath overwhelm your senses with every word she utters. Still, figure that it's in your best interest to respond to her questions. You nervously tell her your name.

"That's a nice name." Zoey responds. "Now I'm sure you have many questions, like 'why did you shrink me?' for instance"

"It crossed my mind" you say sarcastically.

"Well I don't stay in hotels like this due to charity, I am a wealthy businesswoman and you're going to help me with my latest business venture" Zoey says winking at you.

"What do you mean by that?" you ask, nervously.

"I mean that..."

13412.content:
"What?" you say, confused.

Zoey sets you down on her lap and continues talking.

"There's a jewel in the Hawaii state museum that I've had my eye on for a very long time" Zoey explains. "It used to belong to the queen before the islands were colonized."

You look up at her, trying to take in everything she's telling you.

"As you can see." Zoey says, smiling and showing off her rings, bracelets, and earrings. "I have a taste for the finer things in life"

All the jewelry she's wearing is made of precious gems and you can't help but notice that they're all extremely gorgeous. You look in awe at Zoey. She giggles, noticing you eying her.

"I make a living stealing priceless items" she continues. "I either sell them or keep them if I really like my prize."

"Wait, I thought you said you were a businesswoman?" you say.

"I am one" she laughs. "Business is all about robbing, stealing, and deceit. The difference here is that I'm honest about what I do!"

While you do see her point, you still feel uneasy. This woman is a criminal mastermind and you're at her mercy.

"How does all this involve me?" You ask.

"Simple." she smiles. "At your size it will be impossible for the museum's security cameras and infer-red pressure sensors to detect you. What I will need you to do is to infiltrate the security office and disable the security system and allow me to take what I need. I also have gadgets that I invented to help me in my 'adventures' and the shrink ray I used on you is my latest one."

"That explains why she needs a tiny person and how I was shrunk" you think to yourself.

"But why me in particular?" you ask.

"Honestly, because I thought you were kinda cute" she says, winking at you.

"And what makes you think I will go along with this?" you ask indignantly.

Quickly Zoey plucks you off her lap with her thumb and index finger and brings you close to her face. The sudden and intense g-forces nauseate you.

"Because if you don't I will find another use for you, and trust me, you won't enjoy it" she says with an evil smile before setting you back down on her lap.

You've always wanted to be a good citizen and not break the law, but you also know this woman means business and probably will have no problem with hurting you if you don't do what she says.

"So what do you say little guy?" Zoey asks impatiently. "Will you be my tiny helper?"

After thinking for a minute you...

134211.content:
“We got to get going to meet her. You’ll like her. She’s in kind of a unique situation.”

She places you in a small jewelry box and closes and drops you into her purse.

She books a taxi to her friend’s place who is waiting on the steps for her. You hear as they greet each other and exchange warm hugs.

“How are you, Fatima?” your captress asks her friend.

“I’m doing okay, all told,” her friends responds. “Thank you so much for being willing to come out here.”

“No problem. It was on my way. I only wish I could stay more than a night, but with work, I just can’t…”

“I understand. You have a busy schedule.”

“But with everything going on with you, I knew it was important to get here as soon as I could. You seem better than when we talked over the phone.”

“Yeah,” The friend responds, pausing for a long time. “I am. I’m still depressed, though, but I think that was the worst of it.”

“That makes perfect sense. Geez, your husband left you, and you got fired on the same week. Of course that takes time.” Her friend only responded with a quiet hmm as it she was hesitant to acknowledge that. “Your husband was a cheating asshole, and maybe it was time for a brighter job anyways.”

“That’s helpful.”

“I also brought something for you.” You feel her rummage through her purse and grab the box you’re in out. “Here’s a little gift for you.”

“You didn’t have to.”

“It’s fine.”

“No seriously, jewelry doesn’t really help right now.”

“No silly, it’s not jewelry. That’s just the box. Open it!”

You feel the box handed off and feel the top open. Above you stands a woman of normal to slightly skinny build in her thirties, of maybe Algerian or Moroccan descent, black slightly curly hair down to her neck and large hazel eyes. Fatima looks pretty, except that life had sucked the energy out of her.

“I’m not really in the mood for one of your snacks,” Fatima states, looking up at her friend.

“Not this time. I got him for you as a little pet… or a companion… to help you get back on your feet.”

“I don’t know…”

“You need a little company hun.”

“It’s just a lot.”

“You’re depressed. I get it. Such a thing takes a little time to process, but trust me, he’ll help you as you build yourself back together. I needed a few when my husband and I divorced.”

“I don’t know,” Fatimah replies, handing the box back to her.

“Ok, how about this,” your original captress suggests grabbing the box. “Let’s leave him on the mantel here.” As she says this, she walks over to the fireplace and dumps you nonchalantly onto the mantel above it next to a set of pictures. “Let’s hang out and catch tonight. Give it a day or two to think it over and then decide whether you want him. If not, just send him back to me.”

“Okay, it’s just that I never had a little person like that.”

“Just because it’s new doesn’t mean it’s bad, but forget about that for now. Let’s hang out. I leave for my flight by 6:00 am, but let’s go hit a few bars and open you up. Drinks are on me”

They leave as they go paint the town red, leaving you stuck on the mantel.

After a few hours in silence...

You eventually fall asleep lying in darkness despite the hardness of the wood. You wake to hear Fatimah come in. She staggers through the doorway, hammered and goes straight upstairs into her room. The noises go away as you assume she passes out on her bed.

You drift back to sleep, waking in the morning. You wait, stranded on the mantel until you hear your new “owner” come down the stairs well past noon. Her hair disheveled, wearing the same clothes from the day before, hungover. She goes straight into the kitchen to grab some food and drink. With a cup of coffee and a plate full of something, she walks out, distraught by the brightly lit combined living and dining where you have been and sits down at her dining room table to eat.

13421111.content:
She doesn’t even look up at you as she eats her breakfast. Within a few seconds, she finishes and wisps herself back upstairs, not even bothering to put her plate away or to finish her coffee. The shower is running for about 40 minutes, and you hear her blow dry her hair and apply make-up. After about an hour, she comes back down to put her plate in the sink.

“Hey,” you shout. “Excuse me!”

“Oh hey,” she stammers. “I had forgotten about you. Long night.”

She leaves for the kitchen and comes back with a cookie. “Here,” she presents it. She sizes you up. She doesn’t seem to want to harm you yet relatively indifferent to your well-being.

“You’ve got to help me. Bring me to the authorities so I can go back home to the U.S.”

“And get my friend arrested. No that’s not an option. I guess I could use a little pet, but right now, I have a few errands to run. Stay put for now, and when I get back, I will set up a little home for you.”

Before you have time to respond, she grabs her purse, walks out the door. You eat a bit of the cookie, about as twice as large, eating your fill. Then you wait for several hours, trapped on the mantel wish no choice but to wait until she gets back.

“Hey there,” she calls over to you, as she walks over and cusps you with her hand. She places you onto the table next to her plate. “Here, do you want some food?”

On her plate is a breakfast croissant, a few pieces of fruit, and some yogurt. She rips a piece of croissant for you, and you accept gladly.

“My name is Fatimah. What’s yours?”

“Michael.”

“How did you get so small?”

“She just shrunk me out of the blue; I didn’t do anything. Please you got to help me get help and get home.”

“Where are you from?”

“The United States.”

“I see.”

“Please take me to the police or the embassy. They can get me back to my family.”

“I can’t do that. That would get my friend in trouble. She was only trying to help me.”

“Please.”

“No,” she retorted firmly. “But I do need to figure out what to do with you. She’s right that you could keep me company, and you seem like low maintenance for a pet, definitely easier than say a puppy. Plus, I don’t really want to kill an innocent life and getting rid of you otherwise would be a hassle.”

You try to protest, but she simply walks to the other room. She comes back with a second cup of coffee.

“I’ve made my decision, and I am going to…”

“I will keep you” she decides. “My friend is right, I could use some company after all the crap that has just happened to me. Besides you’re a cute little thing” she says playfully poking you.

“But I can’t stay with you, I have my own life back home” you protest.

“Well now you have a new life. You’re mine now, but don’t worry I will take good care of you.” Fatimah says in a non threatening voice. “The truth is, I’m extremely lonely and I would really like a pet. I know it isn’t ideal for you for be this tiny, but I will take care of you and protect you.”

You think about it for a little bit. She seems like a nice woman who could use some company. But she also seems like someone who would be a little too overprotective and not let you leave if you wanted to. It’s not like you have a choice in the matter any way but you think that if you went a long with it, at least for a little while it would be less hard for you.
