After about 20 minutes of walking you stop at what looks like a small cafe. Fatimah sets her purse in her lap and waits for her friend. While she’s waiting she sticks her finger down in her purse and pets you on the top of your head. After about 5 minutes of this you hear Zoey arrive.

“Hi Fatimah!” She says. “It’s so nice of you to see me off before I have to catch my flight home.”

“No problem.” Fatimah replies. “You don’t get to come here often so i wanted to say goodbye to you properly.”

“So, how do you like the little man?” Zoey asks with a smile in her voice.

“I love him” Fatimah says with new found life in her voice. You realize she seems much happier than the first time you saw her. “He’s such a cutie, he will make a great pet for me. Thank you so much.”

“Awww, I just knew you’d love him!” Zoey said with excitement. “I knew he’d be perfect for you when I saw him. May I see him? I want to say goodbye.”

“Of course, he’s in my purse.”

A second later you see a giant hand coming into your carrier. Soon you’re plucked out of Fatimah’s purse and placed on Zoey’s chubby palm. She smiles at you and give you a kiss.

“Goodbye little guy” she says “You should consider yourself lucky I’m not keeping you” she says as licks her lips and winks at you.

You gulp in fear as you watch her lick her lips at you.

“Zoey! You’re scaring him!” Fatimah says taking you from Zoey’s hand.

“Relax, I’m just having fun with him.” Zoey said.

“I know, but he’s just a little thing. You shouldn’t scare him like that.” Fatimah says as she starts petting you.

You role your eyes a bit at how much you’re being babied.

“I better put him back in my purse before someone sees him.” Fatimah said “say goodbye to Aunt Zoey little guy.”

You reluctantly wave goodbye. Zoey waves back and blows you a kiss.

With that she puts you back in her purse. The two woman continue to chat for a bit. Eventually Fatimah hugs Zoey goodbye. You are startled by the sudden motion of Fatimah picking up her purse. You again are jostled about amongst loose items before finally finding a safe place in the corner of her purse.

What happens next?
13421112112.title: Saying goodbye to Zoey

choices: You refuse: you have a line, and this is it.
You try it on, but being forced to gets to you.
You try it on and just swallow the humiliation.
134211121122.content:
You listen passively as she walks through the mall. Sometimes she walks briskly, and sometimes she stops and slowly paces as if browsing around a store. You are left in the dark (literally) only able to guess at what she’s doing.

Eventually, she sets her purse down, lets the light shine in on you by unzipping her purse, and takes you out. She plops you onto a large bench next to her in what appears to be a changing room. She plops a few doll-sized clothing items in front of you.

“I have a few outfits for you to try on,” she explains. “You’re current attire will get worn quickly if it’s the only clothes we have for you.”

You look reluctantly at the clothes she’s laid out in front of you. The first outfit is a miniaturized polo and khaki pants that the Ken doll frequently wear. She looks down at you expectantly. You don’t want to do this though, but seeing her waiting face, you realize it might be easiest to just comply. You take off your clothes and put it on. It fits but is stiff: they cut the clothes for a barbie, not an actual tiny human, so it tugs at you while you try to walk around. She marvels at it, making you realize that it’s going to be a keeper.

The next outfit is a campy sailor costume: a white hat, synchronized navy blue shirt and pants, and a white neckerchief to match the hat. You gasp at it and really don’t want to put it on. She points at it insistently.
134211121122.title: A Few New Outfits

choices: She grabs you and puts the sailor outfit on you herself
She guilt trips you into putting it on
She apologizes for embarrassing you
1342111211221.content:
"No! Uh-uh! This is too much!" you say assertively.

Fatimah smiles down at you with her hands on her hips and raises one eyebrow in amusement. The fact that she doesn't seem to be taking your objections seriously makes you even more angry.

"Look lady" you say indignantly. "There's nothing I can do about being this tiny, I accept that. But I will not have you take my dignity away from me like this. I know I am technically your pet but I am still a grown man with rights. One of those rights is the right not to suffer the humiliation of wearing doll's clothes or a freaking sailor's costume!"

How does Fatimah respond to your protesting?
1342111211221.title: Standing your ground

choices: She decides to let you be for a little while.
She tries to comfort you.
She insists you keep trying on more outfits.
1342111211222.content:
You again realize that you don’t have much of a choice and try it on. She squeals in delight at you as you look across the room into the giant mirror.

You look like a doll or action figure, huddled in an over-the-top outfit as your giant owner giggles down at you. Suddenly the emotions of the everything that happened hit you. You don’t know why this outfit of things ended up being the camel-breaking straw, but all the bent in emotions from the last few days just burst out at you at that moment. It hits you that you are just a toy with toy clothes, and the life you once knew was totally gone.

You kneel into the fetal position and cry uncontrollably. Fatimah tries to tap on your shoulder to talk to you, but every time, you just ignore her. There’s nothing for you now.
1342111211222.title: Straw the Broke the Camel's Back

choices: Fatimah holding a treat of some kind for you
A woman you've never seen reaching for you
Fatimah reaching for you
13421112112221.content:
As you cry, you hear Fatimah let out a sympathetic sigh and walk out of the room. You don't even look up to see her leave, you just hear her massive foot steps as she walks away. You are left alone to process the intense sorrow you're feeling. As you sob, you wish that you could return to your normal life and not be stuck this small and as some woman's pet. She seems nice enough but you want to be your own person again. You were just about to graduate college when all this happened and now all the plans you had in your life mean nothing now. Having to try on over the top clothes was just too humiliating for you to bear.

You continue to cry for several minutes until you can't cry anymore. In an way, you feel better after letting out all your bottled up emotions. Suddenly you hear footsteps that get louder and louder with ever step. The door to your fitting room opens and you see...
13421112112221.title: She decides to let you be for a little while.

choices: "Let's find some clothes that will be less humiliating for you"
"Will you please try on this sailor's outfit?"
13421112112222.content:
Fatimah kneels down onto the floor, closer to your level and gently strokes you as you sob.

"Sweetie what's wrong?" she asks, in a concerned voice.

"What do you think is wrong?!" you lash out. "My life is over! I was shrunk, kidnapped, I'm thousands of miles from home, and now I'm being stripped of my humanity by having to wear clothes meant for dolls! I feel like I'm nothing but a toy!"

"I thought I was helping you..." said Fatimah sadly.

"By making me wear doll clothes?!"

"I just wanted to find you some more clothes. I would feel like a bad owner if you only have the clothes you have on..."

You begin to cry harder.

"But that's the other thing, I don't want to be owned. I had my own life and things I wanted to do, and now I'm nothing. Nothing but your pet!"

Fatimah gently scooped you up into her cupped hands, gave you a gentle kiss, and softly snuggled you against her cheek in an effort to comfort you.

Your tears slowly start to dry up as you realize that Fatimah really does care about you. Noticing that you're starting to calm down, Fatimah gently pulls you away from her cheek and holds you in her open palm level to her face.

"I know this must be a really hard adjustment for you" she says sympathetically. "But my friend who shrunk you has no way to unshrink you."

"I don't understand" you say, sniffling. "If you shrink someone, you can unshrink them, right?"

"Well, I don't know the science behind it but I know she never thought of a way to unshrink anyone because she usually shrinks people so she can eat them...."

You eyes grow wide and you gulp realizing that you may have dodged a bullet.

"So you should consider yourself lucky she decided to give you to me" says Fatimah

All you could do is nod in disbelief.

"And since you're stuck like this" she continues "It makes sense for you to be my pet. With me you'll be safe and taken care of for the rest of your life."

"I know, I know. I just feel like I'm nobody."

Fatimah starts petting you with her free hand.

"You know, for what it's worth, having you as my pet really helped me."

"What do you mean?"

"A week ago, my husband left me for another woman and I was fired from my well paying job. I was feeling really depressed and lonely. Now that I have you, I have a companion, someone to care for, and a tiny man who won't leave me. Having you really helped me get out of my depressive state."

You had no idea how much she appreciated having you around and how much you meant to her. You couldn't help but feel happy.

"Well" you say. "I didn't know I meant that much to you."

"You really do" Fatimah says. "Now..."
13421112112222.title: She tries to comfort you.

choices: You continue to cry
You give up your dignity and do what she says
You angerly take a stand
13421112112223.content:
"Suck it up little guy!" Fatimah insists. "I'm your owner and you will do what I say"

Her words fall on deaf ears as you're too busy drowning in your sorrow to care what she said. The fact that she didn't even care that you were sad made you feel worse.

"Come on" Fatimah orders, growing more inpatient. "This is for your own good, and I want my pet to look nice!"

Again, you're too busy crying to really care that she's sounding increasingly aggressive towards you.

"Look, if you stop crying and try on the other outfits I picked out for you I will get you a treat when we're done"

What do you do?
13421112112223.title: She insists you keep trying on more outfits.

choices: Refuse to smile
Do what she says
1342111211223.content:
Afraid of what she’ll do to you if you refuse, you reluctantly take the outfit and begin to put it on. You’re pleasantly surprised when you realize that the sailor outfit actually fits really well, but the pleasant feeling goes away as soon as you look in the mirror see how ridiculous you look. You feel your face turn red with humiliation, you feel less and less like a man the more you look at yourself.

You look up and see Fatimah squealing with joy as she looks at you.

“You look so precious in that outfit!” she says gleefully. “Don’t move”

Fatimah kneels down closer to you and pulls out her phone.

“Smile!” She says. “I want to take some pictures of my handsome little guy!”

What do you do?
1342111211223.title: Stripped of your dignity

choices: Work
Shop
A Walk
1342111212.content:
"Why are you guys the only ones who get to make decisions on me? What if I don't want to end up as a pet to some stranger in a foreign country? What if I want to be returned to normal and sent home? I didn't ask for any of this!" You cry out, hoping that Fatimah would listen to your cries for freedom and have mercy on you. Unfortunately, the face she was giving you wasn't one of pity, and you were about to find out how she really felt about your desire to be set free.

"Listen here pipsqueak, you don't get to make decisions because we don't listen to people who fit in our purses. You are this height for the rest of your life now, and you better get used to it. Just because you even had the audacity to back talk me, I'm going to teach you a lesson." The tan skinned giantess then reached down to her feet and slipped off one of her moccasins. You were immediately grabbed and thrown onto the ground, to where you were now facing down the gigantic sole of your owner, and nearly went into shock.

The smell wasn't that bad, but she had a good amount of sweat underneath her feet as she ordered you to start licking. You stared at the toes that were out of your reach, bouncing around in anticipation as this French girl was finally about to experience what her friend had no doubt told her all about when it came to dominating a tiny person.

You inched closer, not wanting to touch the smooth soles of this giant, but she soon grew tired of waiting and brought her foot closer, slamming it into your body, pressing you against the warm skin of her foot. You got to work, taking your tongue out and against everything that your mind was telling you, started to lick. You could taste the slight sweat that her foot had amassed as you rubbed your tongue all over this titan's sole.

This went on for some time, with you constantly wanting to gag, but the fear of what she would do to you if you had the audacity to even try held you in check, and you continued with your task that Fatimah had set you on. About ten minutes after you had started, the giantess reached down and plucked you from her toes, and brought you back up to her face.

"See, that wasn't that bad!" Fatimah laughed, looking at your terrified face at about the size of a penny, and under her complete control. As to reward you, she pulled you in to her face, right in front of her bright red lips, to which puckered up and gave a sloppy kiss, even a little bit of tongue poking it's way out of her mouth to grace you.

"Now, little guy I'm going to
1342111212.title: Resistance Is Futile

choices: “I’m going to keep him for myself”
“I will sell him”
“I will have him for a snack later”
134211122.content:
“Nothing personal little guy, but I don’t really think it would be a good idea to keep you as a pet. I don’t really have the money to accommodate a pet. Plus you would probably try to escape and it seems like more of a hassle than it’s worth.” she says. “I’m going to give you back to my friend, let her have you.”

Suddenly, there’s a knock on the door.

“Hello!” It’s Zoey, the woman who kidnapped you. “So, how do you like him?” She asked

“Honestly, I don’t really think I want a pet right now. It just seems like too much trouble” Fatimah said

“I understand” Zoey says as she scoops you up in her hand. “I just wanted to give you the option of having a little guy to be your pet. I don’t have to leave for a little bit, would you like to talk for a bit?

“Sure” Fatima says with a smile in her voice

Zoey casually drops you in her purse and zips it up, dashing any hopes of escape. You sit in total darkness for a few hours listening to the two of them talk about everything from clothes to their favorite books. Finally you hear Zoey say:

“Well, I should get going. It was great seeing you again.”

You then hear Fatimah ask: “what’s going to happen to the tiny man?”

You were hoping she would say that she would take you home and unshrink you. Instead she says...
134211122.title: Back to your original captress

says: "You're all mine now!"
says: "Say hello to your new mommy."
1342111222.content:
You heart sinks as soon as you hear those words. You were really hoping that Zoey would unshrink you after seeing that her friend didn't want you. Your heart begins to race in panic as you continue to listen to the two giantesses' conversation.

"Sell him?" ask Fatimah. "How on earth are you going to do that? I'm pretty sure shrinking people and selling them is illegal."

"I have my ways" Zoey says slyly. "There are always people looking to buy illegal goods on the Black Market and I'm sure there is no shortage of women who would love a tiny man."

"Anything for a fast buck eh?"

"Well yeah, there's no use letting him go to waste is there? Well, anyways, I have to go now. It was great seeing you again Fatimah."

You feel a sudden jolt as Zoey picks up her purse and begins to walk. You sit in her purse wide eyed thinking about what Zoey said as you rock back and forth in your prison. After several minutes, Zoey opens her purse and scoops you out. After adjusting to the sunlight you find yourself standing on Zoey's cubby palm and you see her giant face smiling at you as she hold you close to it. Her lips slowly part and she...
1342111222.title: “I will sell him”

choices: you've got nothing, you're doomed to be Zoe's snack
you've found something in the purse or come up with a plan to buy yourself time
1342111223.content: Upon hearing that you sit bolt upright in Zoe's purse, you were now not just shrunk and kidnapped but this crazy woman was going to eat you for a snack! You began sprinting around the purse, stumbling in the dark but desperate for anything that could help you. You can hear that the two giantesses are still talking outside but your focus is on how you can escape them, but their conversation wont last forever and Zoe has places to be. By the time the conversation wraps up and Zoe starts getting ready to leave...
1342111223.title: “I will have him for a snack later”

choices: Zoey opens her purse
Fatimah is calling over to her
Zoey is getting into a car
13421112231.content:
You feel a sudden jolt as Zoey grabs her purse and starts to walk away. With no hope of escape all you can do is quiver with fear and try to come to terms with the fact that Zoey plans to gobble you up. After a few minutes of feeling the steady motion of Zoey’s purse as she walks, she suddenly stops.

What happens next?
13421112231.title: You've got nothing

choices: She reluctantly gives you back to Fatimah
She refuses
134211122312.content:
“Zoey wait!” You hear Fatimah call.

“Oh hi Fatimah, what’s the matter?” Zoey says inquisitively.

“I change my mind, I want the little man” she states

Zoey laughed. “Why the sudden change of heart” she asks.

“Well, I can’t sand the thought of that cute little guy being eaten.” Admits Fatimah

“Hey, you said you didn’t want him!” Replied Zoey assertively. “And I’m looking forward to eating
him, I was going to dip him in chocolate and everything! You have no idea how tasty tiny men that I shrink are.”

No, I don’t and I don’t want to find out. He’s still a human.” Insists Fatimah. “Besides you brought him here for me and I decided I want him. Plus you can always just find someone else to shrink. But that little guy is mine.”

Meanwhile you cross your fingers hoping that Zoey will give you back to her friend.

What does Zoey do?
134211122312.title: Change of heart

choices: Give you to a friend
Sell you to a pet store
Before she can say anything someone sees you in her hand
1342111223121.content:
“Ok fine.” You hear Zoey say in a slightly annoyed tone.

Right away you are blinded by the sudden rush of light caused by Zoey opening her purse to retrieve you. You are scooped up by Zoey’s chubby hand and brought up to her giant face.

“You are one lucky little man, you know that?” Zoey says with hunger and anger in her eyes.

You gulp hard in fear and nod at her. She chomps her teeth at you before depositing you onto Fatimah’s open palm giving you one last hungry look before turning her attention to her friend.

“Here” Zoey says. “I gave up a delicious meal for you so you better enjoy him.”

All that Fatimah was able to say was “ok, I will”

With that Zoey walked away leaving you with Fatimah who lifted you up to her face. Her beautiful flawless face took up your entire vision.

“Thank you!” You shout to her with joy. “I thought I was a goner!”

“Don’t mention it, I couldn’t let her eat you. I’m not a sadist” Fatimah said in a friendly tone.

“Well thanks again, now can you help get back to the US so I can get back to normal size?” You ask.

“Now hold there little guy.” Fatimah replies. “I may not want Zoey to eat you but she’s still my friend and doing that could get her into a lot of trouble. Besides, what she did to you is permanent”

You are in shock by what she just said and you refuse to believe that.

“Permanent?!” You shout. “It can’t be permanent there has to be something that...”

Fatimah gently put her finger on your face shushing you.

“Hush little man, I told you there’s nothing that can be done.” She replies. “Now the question is, what do to with you. I still am in no position to have a pet so I’ll have to think of something else.”

“I’m a human being!” You reply. “Not a pet”

“Face it little man.” She replies. “To any one you encounter from on you’re a potential pet, or worse if it’s someone like Zoey. Anyways, I think I have an idea.”

What does Fatimah do?
1342111223121.title: She reluctantly gives you back to Fatimah

choices: She puts you on display in the outside window for everyone to see.
She decides to keep you for herself.
A customer walks in before she can decide.
13421112231212.content:
She closes you in her palm. You wait in darkness and anxiety to see what her plan is. She drops you into her purse. You stay there as you hear her get ready and eventually head out.

After several minutes, she opens her purse, and reaches for you. She plops you on what looks like a large counter. Looking around you see several birds, reptiles (which eye you hungrily), and a couple cats and dogs in kernels, as well as food and supplies for each of these. You realize that you are in a pet store.

She talks with the woman behind the counter, who appears to be in her mid-twenties in French. They periodically look down at you, so you know they are discussing you. You wish you knew what they were saying.

Eventually, they conclude. The woman gives Fatimah some money, and Fatimah waves goodbye to you.

“What’s going on?!” you protest.

“You’ll be in better hands than you would with me,” Fatimah explains. “I wish you the best.”

You try to shout back at her, but she’s already at the door. You run towards her screaming as she leaves. You catch your breath and turn to the giant pet store owner who had been observing at you run across her counter, thinking of what to do with you…
13421112231212.title: Sold to a Pet Store

choices: Right away, a woman walking by sees you and takes interest
You feel someone take your jar from behind you
You sit there for a few hours and no one really takes notice of you
134211122312121.content:
Note: dialogue with * is in French and you won't be able to understand it.

You look up and see the giant pet store owner smiling down at you. She's a slim woman in her mid-twenties with long black hair tied in a pony tail. She also has dark brown eyes and pail skin and she's wearing a work uniform with what you assume is the name of the store on it. You can't tell for sure since the words are in French. You knew you had to somehow get this woman to understand you and help you.

"You have to help me miss!" you should up at her. "I was shrunk by the friend of the woman who dropped me off here!"

The woman just gave you a confused expression, but it quickly turned to a warm smile.

*"Well, aren't you the cutest little thing I ever did see. Fatimah told me she has a weird friend who gives her strange gifts but I had no idea that this is what she meant. It's a shame she can't keep you."* the woman says to you. *"Well don't worry, we will find you a new home very soon!"*

You quickly realize that she doesn't speak English, and you also realize you're in trouble as the woman takes an empty jar off the shelf behind her and reaches for you. You start to run away but the woman blocks her path with her giant hand and it quickly wraps around your tiny body and hoists you into the air. The woman brings you to her face and playfully wiggles her finger in front of you.

*"What a feisty little man you are. I know you must be scared but I promise that nobody will hurt you. I'll make sure that whoever buys you will take good care of you. If you're a good little boy I will even make sure they speak English so you can understand them"* the woman says, winking at you.

Before you have a chance to even try to comprehend what the pet store owner just said to you, she carefully lowers you into the glass jar and seals it with a lid with four small holes. She giggles as she writes €500 with a permanent marker on the front of your jar. She then carries you over to the window sill and sets you on the counter facing the front of the store. Then the sad truth hits you. You are being put up for sale in a pet store. You sit down in the jar with your face burried into your knees trying not to break down into tears. You realize that your fate is better than being eaten but you still don't want to be sold as a pet. You feel hopeless and hamulated being put on display for the entire world to see, knowing that you are nothing more than a pet for someone to buy.

What happens next?
134211122312121.title: Tiny man for sale

choices: “I changed my mind”
“You’re going to be eaten”
Someone knocks on the door and Zoey puts you back in her purse
134211122313.content:
You feel the purse fall on a soft surface with a loud “thud” and the voice of your captress tell a driver that she wants to go to her hotel. You figured that you must be in a taxi. You continue to stumble around the purse trying to look for a way out but to no avail.

Zoey notices all the movement going around inside her purse and you can hear her giggling as you frantically move around inside. You realize she’s laughing at you which makes you feel even more hopeless.

After about 20 minutes the taxi stops and you feel a sudden jolt as your captress grabs her purse and makes her to way to her hotel room. When she is sure she’s completely alone, the fat giantess plucks you out of her purse and sets you on her palm. You look back at her giant face staring at you with hunger in her eyes.

“Well little man” says Zoey with that same hungry look in her eye. “It looks like my friend didn’t want you. I was actually kind of hoping for that.”

Zoey licks her lips and smiles eagerly at you. You are terrified and bring yourself to say anything.

“I’m guessing you overheard what I plan to do with you. Well little man...”
134211122313.title: Zoey is getting into a car

choices: Yes, you escape
No, Zoey sucks you back in.
1342111223132.content:
“You’re going to be eaten!” Zoey says excitedly. “You shrunken people always make tasty treats. But first let’s get rid of those pesky clothes” she says giggling.

You try to bat her hand away but she’s too strong. Zoey gleefully yanks your pants off and proceeds to do the same with your shirt and underwear. Your tiny shoes fall off automatically with all of your hopeless thrashing as Zoey slowly strips you down.

“Mmmm much more edible” Zoey says licking her lips again.

“Please don’t eat me!” you shout. “I don’t want die, besides I don’t taste good!”

“You don’t taste good?” Zoey ask in a playful tone. “I’ll be the judge of that.”

Before you can come up with a rebuttal, Zoey brings you to her mouth. Her fat lips part and her giant, wet tongue slithers towards you giving you a slow, through lick. You are drenched in the giantess’s saliva from head to toe as she pulls you away from her mouth.

“Mmm, you’re the yummiest little morsel I have ever tasted!” Zoey exclaimed. “I definitely have to eat you, but I know a way to make you even tastier.”

Zoey closed her fist and walked to the kitchen with you. When she opened her hand again and you looked on in horror as you saw pull out chocolate syrup from the cupboard. For a moment, you thought about jumping off her hand for a quick death. Anything was better than beging digested alive. Unfortunately for you, Zoey was too fast and she plucked you off her palm, holding you by your head and slowly dipped you into the chocolate until all but your head was covered in sticky syrup. Then she lifted you up towards her mouth.

“Goodbye little man, be sure to squirm all the way down to my stomach. I love when my victims struggle.” She said with sadistic pleasure in her voice.

Then she stuck you into her mouth like a piece of hard candy. You laid helplessly on her tongue looking at your only way out, but just as you were able to get even footing on the slimy surface Zoey’s mouth slammed shut leaving you trapped.

Zoey began to lick and suck on you, enjoying every bit of you. The chocolate on your body was steadily washed away as saliva poured onto your helpless body. You began to claw at her tongue trying to get to the entrance of her mouth. Just by sheer luck you were pushed to within an inch of it. With all your might you begin to push your head between her lips. Your head sticks out between Zoey’s lips and you struggle to get free. Does it work?
1342111223132.title: “You’re going to be eaten”

13421112231322.content:
You hear Zoey chuckle to herself and you are swiftly sucked back into her mouth. She continues sucking on you like a piece of hard candy while you try not to drown in the saliva that is battering at your minuscule body. Suddenly Zoey pins you against the back of her teeth and begins to vigorously lick you with her giant tongue.

After her tongue has its way with you, you are tossed up to the roof of Zoey’s mouth and sent to the back of her throat. Then you hear the sound you’ve been dreading: *gulp*. You begin your decent down to Zoey’s stomach. The muscles in her esophagus almost squeeze the life out of you as you are slowly pushed down. You can feel slight pressure coming from what seemed to be the outside of Zoey’s throat.

“Is she feeling me going down her gullet?” You ask yourself in horror.

You can hear faint giggling as you thrash around trying to slow your decent. It’s no use, before long you drop into Zoey’s stomach with a loud splash. You bang your fists and kick against the walls of Zoey’s stomach in a desperate hope of getting out. All it does is make Zoey laugh even more as she pats and rubs her giant belly in satisfaction.

Soon you begin to feel weak and are longer able to fight. You realize that the digestive enzymes are beginning to break down your body. You quickly lose conscious and you are slowly digested. As this happens Zoey lets out a petite burp and smiles.

“Excuse me” she says to herself. “He was tastiest thing I have ever eaten. I need to lay off tiny people though. They’re making me really fat.”

With that, she happily grabs her purse and goes out to see some sights before she catches her flight home. Suddenly, there’s a bright light as Chelsea unzips her purse. After a few seconds of the blinding light your eyesight comes back but all you can see is Chelsea’s giant face smiling down at you.

You see her massive hand reach into the purse and grab...
13522321211.title: To the hotel

choices: Someone knocks on the door
Chelsea wraps you up
Chelsea changes her mind and decides to keep you for herself
135223212111.content:
As you expected Chelsea scoops you up and takes you out of her purse. You didn’t even try to fight it, you are happy to be out of her purse after so long. She brought her closed hand to her face and opened it. All you could see was her giant face.

“Well hello my little cutie” she said enthusiastically. “Did you enjoy the flight?”

“As good as i was able to given the circumstances” you said weakly.

“Oh cheer up!” Chelsea said still in that same peppy tone. “You should be happy that you’re going to be my friend’s birthday present. I’m sure she’ll just love you! Speaking of which we need to get you ready!”

“Get me ready?” You say with fear in your voice. “What exactly do you mean by that?”

“We need to wash you of course!” She said as a matter of factly. “You’ve been in my purse for hours plus you had my saliva all over you” she continued, winking at you.

She walked over to the bathroom with you in her palm and turned on the sink while feeling the water to make sure it wasn’t too hot or cold. You then saw her reaching for your clothes.

“What the hell are you doing?!” You say batting at her giant fingers.

“You can’t be washed with your clothes on, silly!” giggled Chelsea. “Besides you don’t need them now anyway. Pets don’t wear clothes.”

Angered by what she said you continue resisting her as she forcibly removed your shirt, pants, and finally your underwear all the while giggling as she took your clothes off.

“You’re so cute when you struggle!” She coos as she starts bathing you. “Olivia is so lucky to be getting you.”

You feel so humiliated, you’re being bathed like a child and you feel you’re about to die of embarrassment. Eventually Chelsea finishes and gently dries you with a towel. You see her flush your tiny clothes down the toilet with a mildly sinister grin further driving home the point that you’re nothing more than a tiny pet for her friend.

Chelsea scoops you up and takes you over to the bed and places you on the blanket. You see her take a small jewelry box of some kind and wrapping paper out of her luggage. She places the box on the bed, opens it, and looks at you.

“Get in” She commands.

You reluctantly get in the box and...

With that closes the box. Soon you hear the sound of her wrapping you up in gift wrap. She places you in her purse and heads out of the room. You again feel the steady motion of Chelsea’s footsteps as you eat your carrot.

You’re afraid what’s going to happen to you when Olivia sees you. What’s going to be her reaction? Will she help you? Will it be a big party where many women will see you tiny and helpless? All these questions and more swim through your head as you head towards Olivia’s apartment.

It isn’t long before you hear Chelsea enter a building.

“I guess she doesn’t live far” you thought.

You hear Chelsea ring the doorbell to her friend’s apartment. You hear the deafening boom of high heels as a woman comes out to meet her.

What’s going on?

Sadly for you, they think you’re just a doll and you are screened through to Chelsea’s plane.

You realize there was nothing to do but wait, so you find some soft material to lay on in the bag. Eventually you come across what feels like a pair of sweatpants and you fall asleep.

Meanwhile Chelsea was sitting in her seat listening to music and enjoying the flight. She was really looking forward to her friend’s birthday now that she got her such a cool present.

You are suddenly woken up by the motion of the plane landing.

“This is it” you think to yourself nervously.

You feel your bag being taken off the plane and being transported to the baggage claim. You again feel the motion of being carried on a conveyer belt. After a few minutes you hear the loud boom of footsteps approaching the bag.

1352233.content:
“I see. Well, I’m glad I saw you,” she states. “I am heading to Miami for my friend’s birthday, and could use a snack during the long flight. I didn’t have time to purchase along the way over.”

“But you can’t eat me…”

“Hmm,” she replies, cutting you off. She brings you to her mouth and places you up to your waist inside, as if testing to see whether you are small enough to fit. And you are: her full lips are nearly twice your size. “It looks like I definitely can.”

“I have a life. You can’t just eat me now!”

“Oh don’t worry,” she explains matter-of-factly. “I’m not hungry yet; plus I’m going to take little nap. So you’ll have some time, maybe an hour or so until I work up an appetite.”

You begin to object, but she’s done talking about it. “Where should I put you where no one will see you during my nap?” she asks herself.

What does she decide?

14.content: You wake up and everything is black. You try to shuffle you're way around, but you're stuck. You're not sure exactly where you are and what is making you stuck, but you're surrounded by soft materials of various kinds. You're surroundings are constantly shifting, as you are being carried (except you haven't realized that are being carried nor that you've shrunk yet). You try to move around to determine anything about what's going on. What happens?

choices: Try to escape
Take a nap
141.content:
The shifting stops with a sudden thud as if the thing you are being carried in has been set down.
Suddenly, light shoots into the soft chamber of which you’re trapped in. You realize I’m horror you’re in someone’s luggage. As your eyes adjust to the light again you see you are surrounded by various types of women’s clothing. You look down to see yourself laying on top of a bra, one that looks like it belongs to a woman with large breasts.

Before you can really grasp the full gravity of the situation a giant hand with painted blue fingernails reaches into the luggage and scoops you up. You then look up to see the face of a giant woman staring right at you. She appeared to be in her early to mid twenties and had striaght long red hair. She was wearing a black tank top that exposed her breasts, tight jeans, and from what you see she was also wearing running shoes. She also was wearing a big silver bracelet on her left arm. As her big blue eyes studied you a smile came across her lips.
“Well hello there little guy” she said in a sweet voice
You’re still in too much of a state of shock to really respond. After all you just realized you spent god knows how long in this woman’s bag and now you’re in the palm of her hand.
“Awwww, you’re such a cutie!” She exclaimed wiggling her finger in front of you. “I’m so happy I caught you!”
“W-wait” You stammer “what do you mean caught me?”
“I shrunk you, silly” she explains
“I bought an experimental shrink ray on my way to the airport. I am on my way home from vacation and I saw you and I thought how great it would be to have a tiny guy like you all for myself.” she ended with a light poke at your tiny body.
“The person who sold it to me also said that the victim would be knocked out for a little while so it gave me plenty of time to put you in my luggage and take you somewhere where I can look at you with being noticed” she added
“I can’t go with you! I’m in college and I have a family! I’m flying home to see them!” you protest
“Too bad little one” the woman says feigning empathy “you’re mine now and you’re just going to have to live with that. I’ll take care of you I promise” with that she lifts you up to her mouth and gives you a kiss. Your entire body is covered by her lips and you’re covered in her saliva. She giggled and gently dried you off with her shirt.
“What are you going to do to me?” You say in a shaken tone.
“I haven’t really decided yet, but don’t worry. I have a nice long flight to think of something.”
Suddenly a loud speaker announced the woman’s flight.
“That’s us little guy, back into my bag you go” she says in a sing songy voice
With that she plucks you off her palm with her fingers, drops you in her bag and zips you up.
You feel the bag lift up and begin shifting again as the woman hums to herself. As you lay on the soft bed made out of her clothes you think about the predicament you’re in. You think that maybe everything will be fine, she seems like a nice woman (but obviously a little nuts) who wouldn’t want to hurt you. You also worry what she could do to you since you’re so small and at her mercy.

The woman makes her way onto her plane and stuffs her bag with you in it into the overhead bin above her seat. As the plane takes off you ponder your options. The zipper is close enough to try and open and you could make an escape attempt. You then think that there’s really nowhere to go on a plane 35,000 feet in the air. The clothes you are laying on are also very comfy and you’re tired from not being able to sleep the night before and you could use a nap, but this could be your only chance to escape this woman’s clutches.
What do you do?

The hole is just large enough to fit your small body, so you decide to climb out. You don’t know who this person is or why the shrank you, but you doubt it was for benevolent purposes. You land harshly against the ground and assess your surroundings. Where are you?

You catch your breath and look around to form a plan. You realize that you are at the front desk for a gate, in the space under the desk. In front of you is a giant flight clerk, busy looking at her computer. On the other side is an irate woman.

“What do you mean the flight is cancelled?” she shouts. “I need to get there today to meet my friends!”

“I’m sorry for the inconvenience from the weather,” the clerk apologizes. “Let me see what the next flight we can put you on.”

“This is some fucking bullshit,” she interjects.

“I understand,” the clerk responds.

You notice a large line of people forming behind this woman, each of whom are distraught from their flight cancelling. The clerk looks calm but busy as she fields everyone’s rerouting. You’ll need to get someone’s help, but what’s the best strategy?

14213311.content:
“Was sind sie?” you hear the woman say. “Warum bist so klein? Hast du ein Name?“

“Excuse me?” You say in a confused voice. “I don’t have any idea what you’re saying.”

“Est tut mir Leid, ich verstehe nicht. Ich spreche kein English.“ the Woman continues

“Listen, I shrunk somehow and was kidnapped by some woman and I just escaped from her luggage. Please help me! Take me to security or something.” You say slowly.

The woman just cocks her said to one side and gives you a confused expression as you talk.

“Est tut mir Leid kleiner Mann, ich verstehst du nicht“ the Woman says frowning, but soon she gets the same big smile as before.

“Aber du bist sehr niedlich und ich möchte ein niedlich Haustier.” The Woman says as she starts stroking your back with her index finger. You don’t know what’s going on but you’re starting to get the feeling she isn’t planning to help you get unshurnk.

“What are you doing lady?!” You say indignantly trying to push her finger away..

Suddenly the woman picks you up and holds you close to her face between her thumb and index finger.

“Was für ein lebhaftes kleines Ding. Du bist das perfekte Haustier. Jetzt lass mich dir einen Kuss geben!“

The woman moves you to her mouth as her lips start to pucker.

“Hey what are you?!” You start shouting.

Before you can finish you’re pressed against the giant woman’s lips as the engulf your tiny body. She pulls you back and your body is covered from head to toe in a thin layer of saliva. The woman smiles at you and blows on you a little.

“Zeit meinen Flug zu erwischen, kleiner Mann.” Your captress says. “Du kannst in meiner Handtasche reiten” she continues, winking at you.

You hear the engine of her car start and you feel the car move as Sydney starts to drive away from the airport. You know this won't be the last time you feel this way since you're seen as nothing more than a cute little pet for a gorgeous giantess.

What happens next?
144122122332.title: You submit

choices: Take a bath
Have dinner
Writer's choice
1441221223321.content:
After 20 minutes of driving. You feel the car slow down and make a sharp turn before coming to a complete stop. You can hear Sydney humming to herself while feeling the sudden motion of her grabbing her purse and luggage. The motion of her purse gently swaying back and forth is soothing, though you refuse to admit it to yourself. Loud booms register in your tiny ears as Sydney walks up a few flights of stairs. Suddenly light rushes into the purse and Sydney peers in, she smiles waves at you as her hand reaches in. You brace yourself, assuming she's going to grab you. Instead she grabs her keys which were right next to you. Leaving her purse unzipped, you look up at her as she unlocks the door and enters her apartment.

She walks in and sets you on the coffee table in the living room and reaches into her purse again with a big smile on her face.

"Now I'm coming for you little one" she says playfully.

You are quickly scooped up in her hand and brought to Sydney's giant face. You sit in her open palm looking around her home, you realize it's a really nice one room apartment in the heart of downtown.

"Welcome to your new home!" Sydney exclaims. "Since I haven't had time to get you a proper bed, you will be sleeping in my purse for the time being. I figured it would be a good idea since you will be spending a lot of time in the there anyway."

"What do you mean I will be spending a lot of time in there anyway?" you ask nervously.

"It's going to be your pet carrier of course! You will be riding in my purse when I decide to take you places."

You feel the same humiliating feeling you did before, now you really do feel like nothing but property. Sydney then starts snuggling you against her cheek again.

"You are just the cutest!" she exclaims. "I could just snuggle you all day!"

You try your best to not show how good it feels to cuddled against her soft skin but you can't help but smile a bit.

"Well little man, we've both had a long day. I think it's time to.."
1441221223321.title: You arrive at Sydney's house

choices: Try to escape
Wait out the flight
Something else happens before you can decide
1442.content:
“Good afternoon ladies and gentlemen and welcome aboard our flight” you hear a female voice say.

As the stewardess continues with pre-flight safety instructions you realize you’re on a departing plane to god knows where. Suddenly, you start to put the pieces together. You’re in a dark place you can’t get out of, you’re surrounded by soft materials, and you’re on an airplane.

“I’m in someone’s luggage?!” You shout out loud, terrified with the sudden realization of what’s going on.

You have no idea how it happened. You figured you must have shrunk somehow. You wonder why you were shrunk, even more so why you are in someone’s luggage. What could they want with you? Who’s luggage is it? Where are they taking you? You kept repeating these questions to yourself over and over as you hear the plane take off. The bag your in slides a little as the planes gains altitude.

“I must be in the overhead compartment” you think.

The next thing that comes to your min as the plane reaches cruising altitude is whether or not you should try and escape. It’s not exactly an easy task given that it’s pitch black dark and you can’t see any way out. Even if you’re able to get out you’ll still have to somehow get out of the overhead compartment that you’re pretty sure the luggage is in. It could be best to just wait it out and see what happens.

On the other hand you think that it could be worth a shot. You don’t know where you’re going, or the intentions of whoever shrunk you and put you in their luggage. After deliberating with yourself you decide to...
1442.title: Fasten your seatbelt

choices: Light rushing into the bag you’re in
The motion of the plane landing
You’re in some woman’s palm
14422.content:
You realize that escape at this point is not a very realistic option.

“I can’t see a thing. Besides, I have no idea what’s on the other side even if I’m able to escape this suitcase” you think to yourself

You decide that the best thing to do is to try and get some sleep. It won’t do any good sit and worry about what will happen next. You come to the conclusion that whoever did this to you needs you alive so you’re not going to die. That eases your mind a little.

Eventually, you find a nice spot on the soft material in the suitcase and quickly fall asleep. You have no idea how long you’ve slept but you are suddenly woken up. The suddenness of what wakes you up startles you.

How are you woken up?
14422.title: Nothing to do but wait

choices: Your bag is unzipped.
You are loaded onto a vehicle.
You are handed off to someone.
144222.content:
Suddenly you are woken up by a bump. You instantly recognize it as airplane tires making impact on a runway. As the plane makes its way to the gate your mind is racing with similar thoughts as before.

Without warning your thoughts are interrupted with the sudden jolt of someone grabbing the bag you’re in. Some clothes fall on you and scramble your way to the top of the pile of belongings and try to get an even footing as your captor starts walking. You feel the steady motion of being carried off the plane and through the airport.

After a few minutes you start hearing a voice and then another. The voices are clearly female but they are muffled and you can’t hear what they are saying. All of the sudden all the motion stops but you still hear the muffled voices of two women. Your heart starts pounding in fear.

What happens next?
144222.title: The motion of the plane landing

choices: It’s the voice of someone you know, adding to the mystery.
You’ve never heard her before, but she speaks English at least.
The woman isn’t speaking a language you know.
1442221.content:
The bag is unzipped, and light engulfs your space. Your eyes had gotten used to darkness for the last few hours, and with this light, you are blinded. You have to look up to see what is going on, though. You stare at the silhouette of a giant woman’s face: it’s too bright to make anything out about her.

You hear her call to her friend, and from her voice try to make sense of the situation.
1442221.title: Voice Impressions

choices: You get flattened but with a twist.
You find a hole in the shoe last second and go for it.

You look around and notice a small glimmer of light you run to it and dive though it realizing its a hole in the bag, when as you start to descend its too late you can not change course all you can see is a bright pink shoe that you are above the opening.

From the hight your at u can see for a bref moment the true size of it and you determine (before even knowing) that it must belong to a little girl around the ages of 12-13 years old.

You finaly land I side it and try your damnedest to climb out but failed as you see a foot the size of a sky scraper to you start entering the shoe. (Its a bright pink,white and blue striped sock covering the foot of your new captor.)

Whats next?

Readers choice.
1451.content:
You get flattened but feel no pain at all, you think to yourself 'I should be dead whats happening?!' When suddenly u hear 2 doors shut and a car start up. You are being unawarely kidnapped and brought somewhere else.

After about 2 and a half hours of this girl stomping her feet to a song as she sings to it (Witch confirms her age as it was a birthday song she is now 13 years old.) The car finaly stops and she gets out both doors shut again you hear a loud BEEP BEEP as the car was locked.

They enter a house as the girl starts running for a few minutes then kicks off her shoes and u fall out (like a paper would fall off a desk.) You see that she's in her room as she enters a room ajasint to her bedroom. Curious you some how pull yourself back to normal then run to that door.

You see a small crack under it and stop and think.

'Should I go under it or find a place to hide out here?'

What happens next?
1451.title: You get flattened but with a twist.

choices: Stay and warship her feet unaware to her?
Run away while this slow time thing is happening.
14511.content:
You choose to go under the door and see the room full of steam and hear water running. You think to yourself 'this must be her own bathroom, I wonder where the tub is' you start walking towards the water sound when it suddenly stops. You see a huge figure walk into view and dry off she gets dressed with all but socks.

That's when the steam clears up and you notice you are standing semi inside one of her clean folded socks as her hand reaches down for your soon to be sock prison, you feel a weird tingling feeling and everything slows down and you now have plenty of time to escape.


What do you do?
14511.title: Go under the door.

15.content:
You start to look around, but all you can't focus. All you can see is lines swirling back and forth. Even though you can't tell what's going on, you can tell something chaotic is happening. You hear screams from all around you. Eventually your body just can't take all the chaos anymore. You just close your eyes and hope for the best. After a minute or so, the screams are biting your curiosity and fear, so you reopen your eyes to see what's going on. You feel a lot less dizzy and more able to process what's going on.

What is going on?
15.title: Chaos

choices: ... hide you away for your own safety!"  (Keep as pets)
... get rid of ya. Sorry..." (Boot crushin')
... show you all to the world!" (Out into the giant world you go)
151.content:
You stand up, slowly regaining your bearings as the floor shakes beneath you.

CLACK.

You notice all the people around you are similarly dazed and confused and something feels... off. Just a subtle thing you cant quiiiiiite notice but its nagging at the back of your head...

CLACK.

Another shake. The hustle and bustle of the airport remained dead silent, stunned by the tremor.

CLACK.

A shadow starts to fall across the wide concourse as you realise what it off... the light... you look to the window to see...

CLACK.

Two hazy pillars towering in the distance, they move closer and closer.

No. It can't be...

The still of the airport quickly turned to chaos and panic as...

CLACK. CLACK. CLACK.

The pillars move ever closer to reveal what they are. Two impossibly large high heeled boots. The heels at the back alone are several times stalled than the building you stand in.

The left boot took another step as a cataclysmic explosion threatened to burst your eardrums. The red sole of the gargantuan piece of footwear collided into a plane outside causing it to crumple and burn on impact.

A mischievous giggle came down from the heavens, amplified to an ungodly volume.

"Oops."

The boots retracted as the vast, almost incomprehensible creature lowered down onto her belly and take a peek inside the pitiful building in her shadow. Soon you could see a vast green eye behind spectacles looking straight at you with wonder. The clothing in the distance looked like a lab coat.

"I cant believe this worked. Hi little people!!!!"

Her eager shouting caused everyone to stop and cover their ears.

"Sorry about this. I was working on this device to transport people across dimensions, ya see? It was only supposed to bring one person across but I didnt expect for your world to be so, well, buggy! Ah well, now you're here I guess I gotta..."
151.title: The Great Experiment

choices: Several giant women looking down into the jar (you're being put up for adoption)

You're in front of a large audience being shown off at a scientific convention
1513.content:
"I guess I gotta show you off to the giant world!" booms the giantess.

She giggles as she holds a giant device above everyone in the airport which to you looks like a giant light. Suddenly there's a blinding flash as if an atom bomb had just detonated above you. You and everyone in the airport are knocked out. The giantess hums to herself as collects all the unconscious humans and puts them in a container and prepares for the journey back to her home world. She takes a device out of her lab coat, pushes a button that activates a portal to her home world, and steps through back to her world.

When you finally regain consciousness you look around to see that you and everyone else in the airport are in a pitch black darkness. Suddenly you hear the booming *clack clack* sound of high heeled shoes that you heard before, you also feel a slight motion and you soon realize you're being carried somewhere. In panic, you run in the first direction you think of but smack into what you think is a force field. It doesn't take long to realize that you actually ran into glass.

Several questions begin to race through your mind: where am I? where is everyone that was in the airport? what did this woman mean by "showing us off to the world?". You feel the glass prison you're in being set down somewhere and you realize you may get your answers soon. Suddenly you are blinded again with a sudden burst of light, but this time it is caused by the removal of a black tarp that was over what you now see is a giant glass jar.

After getting your eyesight back you see that every one from the airport is with you and you look up to see...

Two gargantuan fingers lift you up.

The General’s hand places you in a thin but deep pocket on her chest. She plans use you to
1513133.title: Commanding officers

choices: A short game

15131333.content:
In the General’s world, spies that were the private property of their masters were called “private agents”. These were incredibly useful to powerful people who wanted personal loyalists as opposed to public servants. And thumbelinos—wild men from other dimensions miniaturized from a inch to a foot but generally to the size of an average woman’s thumb—were poor fighters but excellent spies.

A spymaster could play many games with her private agents.

A short game involved teleporting them in and out of enemy territory to investigate nooks and crannies.

A medium game involved gifting them to people for a spy operation meant to fight the recipient.

A long game was more subtle—the goal was not to fight but to use the spy as an agent of influence over the recipient.

Based on her current intrigues, the General would surely deploy you for
15131333.title: Be a spy loyal not to the Army but her personally

C. An ambitious striver and lead General. The current Lady Emperor was bored by administrative work. Perhaps she could be convinced by her new pocket pet’s spymaster to make the spymaster Chancellor, Fleet Commander or Chief of the Gendarmes.

15321.content:
You open your eyes and it’s pitch black dark. You feel very disoriented. All you know is that you shrunk somehow. That alone makes your heart jump with fear. You try to feel around for any clues on where you might be other than what sounds like a beach. Suddenly your hands run into some soft material that almost feels like leather. You make a confused look to yourself and then run into what feel like a long medal tube.

“Where the hell am I?” You think to yourself.

Then you remember that you were carrying a your phone when you shrunk.

“Maybe it shrunk too” you thought.

You feel around in your pocket and sure enough your phone was there. You quickly turn on the flashlight. Your eyes nearly pop out in shock at what you see. Lipstick, a giant phone, perfume, sunglasses, and other things that you would find in handbag. Right away you realize you’re in some woman’s handbag! You are further dismayed when you notice the two magnetic bars keeping the bag shut. There’s no escape.

So many questions and thoughts start racing through your head. How did this happen? What am I doing at a beach? What does this person want with me? Why am I in a handbag?

Just then...

1533212.content:
As you rest against the cloth of your girlfriend's uniform pocket, you appreciate the cushion provided by her right breast. Yet as she continues marching through the parade, you begin to get suspicious about the coincidences. The coincidence that you were to meet her at the airport. The coincidence that you shrank at the airport. The coincidence that you blacked out and woke up in her country. The coincidence that she picked you up off the street without showing shock. Too many coincidences.

Natalya marched with a smile after picking up her boyfriend without a hitch. Her mother's best friend, an accomplished general and military scientist, had devised shrinking and teleportation technology for her nation's military. That best friend had used her connections to become Natalya's commanding officer. It had all worked out so well.

Natalya's commander had told her that all the tests needed were done. Still she was toying with the idea of keeping Tim for herself in case she wanted to run more tests. If not, then Natalya would be allowed to keep Tim as a pocket pet, provided she pass to her commander notes on how the test subject was adjusting to his new situation.

Later that night, when the parade had ended, Natalya unbuttoned her right uniform breast pocket and fished Tim out of it.

Natalya fishes you out of her pocket and sets you on a table surrounded by six loud, bold and brash giantesses—the General, three staff officers, Natalya’s mom (Katya) and Natalya herself. The giantesses converse in Russian ignoring the shrill English of the weak thumb-sized man trying to make his plight heard!

Meanwhile, in the Russian-language dialogue, they discuss what to do with you.

Option 1: A Birthday Gift
The General is pleased with Natalya and will give her a promotion. Natalya’s mom is also appreciated for her role as an intermediary. Therefore the general will be gifting you to her as a pocket pet and birthday gift.

Option 2: Further Studies
The General wants you for further studies. Without a further ado, she will simply grab you and put you in her pocket.

Option 3: A Pet for the Staff
The three staff officers with the General plea with her to keep you as a pet for the staff rather than “do something horrible with him”.

15332121221231.content:
Much to your displeasure, the General carries you around, as you are trapped helplessly in a jar, and walks around the many hallways of the military base. Finally she stops in a room and you are blinded by the bright lights of a room that looked like a mix of a laboratory and a workshop. A giant figure and what appears to be her assistants sit at a desk in the middle of the room. She is still too far to make out her individual features but you see she has more stars than the General. She yells in Russian and one of the technicians quickly unscrews the jar to take you out of it. The other assistant has a small set and she takes out wires, tools, and tiny batteries. You struggle and fight but with a single gloved figure, you are held in place as another giant hand ties wire and straps a small device to your back.

When you are released from the finger, you do not try to touch it. It feels like a bomb strapped around your chest, you gulp. The General's boss watches you with a sinister smile and nods. She holds her head, accidentally putting the volume too low, and adjusts the headphones. It makes sense now. They've made you into some sort of tiny listening device... but what will they use you for?

The thought of international espionage sounds thrilling. Being around the world, encountering beautiful women, even though you are shrunken and not exactly working for one of your country's allies. Unfortunately the General has something else planned for you and it has nothing to do with national security.

Still trapped in a jar, you now find yourself waiting in the car, parked in front of what appears to be a university. The General stop paying attention to you and is texting away on her phone. She made a few calls on the way to this place and your limited Russian gave you some details about a fight with a girl named Dasha. The outside of the car is filled with the loud sounds of students chatting, laughing, and loitering in the parking lot.

The General tries making a call again. She hisses when it fails to go through and looks back at you again, trapped in the jar. Unscrewing it, she takes you out and cups a palm around you. A few seconds later, you hear in the darkness, the sound of the car door opening and a younger sounding voice in Russian arguing with your captor. The conversation starts to get heated and you feel the hands cupping you become tighter and sweatier...

1533212122123111.title: You make a move and bite the palm

15332121221231113.content:
The teleportation knocks you unconscious. When you awake, the gear is off of you. You are in fact naked. The room you’re in is made of dark grey plastic with a hazy yellow light. But besides an equally dark gray plastic bench, nothing’s distinct and nothing of the outside world can be seen or heard.

You suspect that you are still shrunk and that the plastic prison was constructed with shrinkees in mind. Suddenly a burst of light comes as the ceiling of your cell is removed and your suspicions confirmed.

The General had decided to...
15332121221231113.title: After a few hours on the run, you are teleporte...

choices: Natalya
Olga

153321212212311133.content:
The agent, a powerful feminine colossus in an army uniform, tips you into her cupped palm which she holds equally distant from her face and breasts.

The General had had three such agents available, with excellent training, English-language proficiency and acute awareness of foreign cultures.

There was Natalya, your former “girlfriend”.

There was Olga, who had less direct experience but great skill in crafting living space for miniatures. The prison cell you were just removed from was designed and manufactured by her.

There was Svetlana. She was the daughter of the other General you encountered when they put the gear on you. She really wanted to work with you because she was “sure he’s a sweet little man” and looked forward to “having a friend I can keep in my pocket”.

choices: Surrender
Escape
15332121222.content:
“Well, better to die than be a lab specimen!” You think to yourself.

With that, you cross your heart and jump. As you make impact on the hard floor you realize you’re not only alive, but you don’t seem to be hurt at all! You can’t believe it, but you have no time to count your blessings as you hear the loud booms of the giantesses boots coming towards you while shouting in Russian.

After being nearly grabbed multiple times you make under a narrow crack between the floor and nearby counter. You let out a huge sigh of relief but you soon see that your troubles aren’t over yet. You can hear the deafening boom of the three women stomping around your safe haven.

“We know you’re under there.” You hear Natalia say to you. “The experiments will not hurt you, I promise. Besides you can’t stay under there forever! Even if you could escape where would you go?”

You know she’s right but suddenly, you spot an air conditioning vent on the floor. You think that it’s perfect to use as an escape route. The last thing you want to be is experimented on. You’re a human being after all. Then again, you agree that Natalia makes a valid point. Where would you go if you escaped?

Eventually you decide to...
15332121222.title: You jump

choices: In another room in the building
On the sidewalk outside of a science center
On the grass on a military base
153321212222.content:
“There’s no way I’m going to trust them. Besides, I don’t want to think about what they’ll do to me once I outlived my usefulness.” You think.

With your mind made up, you jump into the vent. It’s a fairly long fall, but once again, you come out of it unscathed. You smile in triumph knowing you escaped. As you walk down the corridors trying to find a way out, you start to wonder if being shrunk also allowed you to fall without getting hurt. You wonder if you could have had more answers if you stayed, but you reminded yourself it probably wasn’t worth the price.

You eventually come to a junction where one way seems lighter than the other. Naturally you go that route thinking that light means a way out. The further you go the lighter it gets. You eventually come to a cage like lid at the end of the corridor. You are feeling quite pleased with yourself as you push yourself through the vent lid.

After a quick look around you see you’re...
153321212222.title: Escape
