1533212122223.content:
As you wander the grass, you exalt in your new-found freedom under the moonlit sky.

The general, meanwhile, had other things to do. Also this was an attempt to teach the little man about the futility of escape.

"This guy doesn't get it," she thought, "If we can transport him from across half the world, then surely we can transport him from somewhere on the military base."

Going from the meeting-room to the lab, she frustratedly barked out an order to the technicians.

Suddenly a new wormhole emerges, knocking you unconscious!

Looking in her white leather purse, General Lyuda Sokolov smirked at the unconscious little man inside. In three days, when he would awake, she would be carrying that purse to a ball.

When the day of the ball arrives and she withdraws you from the purse on her limo ride there, she...
1533212122223.title: On the grass on a military base

choices: “Sell you to the highest bidder”
“Give you to a member of the project as a reward”
“Run one final test on you at the ball”
15332121222233.content:
“Wake up tiny man!” a gruff feminine voice says to you.

You slowly open your eyes and realize in horror that you’re on the palm of the General who captured you. Only she looked different than before, instead of a military uniform, she was wearing a formal red dress and fancy jewelry.

“W-where I?” You ask, still feeling a little disoriented. “How the hell did I end up back with you?!”

“Silly fool” chuckles Lyuda. “You were shrunk and teleported here by experimental weapon. It worked on you when you were home in US. What makes you think it wouldn’t work here!”

You are shocked by what you just heard.

“A-a weapon?!” You say in disbelief.

“Yes, we plan on using it in the event of a war but we needed to test it on someone first.” replied Lyuda. “We wanted to test it on someone far away. We sent Natalia to date an American so we could teleport and shrink you so she could bring you to me.”

“So you put Natalia up this?!” You say angrily.

“Actually it was her idea.” Replied the general. “She did a great service to her country.”

You feel hurt and betrayed over finding out that your girlfriend was behind your kidnapping.

“So Natalia betrayed me to help you make a doomsday device?” You ask indignantly.

“It’s not a doomsday weapon” replied Lyuda. “If anything it’ll prevent war by scaring people away from wanting to provoke us!”

“But such a weapon shouldn’t be in the hands of any body!” You shout. “Immorality aside, you better unshrink right now!”

Your captress laughed.

“I’m afraid I can’t do that little one.” She says “you know too much.”

“You cannot do this to me!” You shout. “I am a human being and I have rights! You can’t just have me as some shrunken lab rat!”

“Who said you’re going to be lab rat?” Says Lyuda. “I’ve already ran all the tests I need to on you. I’m on my way to ball to celebrate job well done along with the other military officers and scientists who worked on this little project”

Lyuda laughs at her pun as you role your eyes.

“Like I said, I can’t just let you go. So I’m taking you to formal ball with me so I can....”
15332121222233.title: The two of you argue in English

choices: Natalya admits her commander gave you to her as a pocket pet.
Natalya offers a plan to evade those responsible for shrinking you.
15332122.content:
Before releasing her Tiny Tim from the pocket of her army uniform, Natalya bit her lip. Tim Thompson had been pleasantly surprised when Natalya had chosen him as a boyfriend. On the one hand, he was introverted and less of a stud than many of his classmates. But Natalya had chosen him with a suitable pocket pet in mind. He was a witty and funny companion. If she revealed to him, what had happened, then his timidity and desire for a woman's affection could be easily be used to train him to be a docile pet in short order.

On the other hand, revealing to him her betrayal of him and reduction of him to be a shrunken test subject would break his heart. Certainly he would be a less perky pocket pet. She could say that she was a rogue agent, trying to save him from her superiors to allay any suspicions and insist that he stay hidden to help her protect him. That would have the added advantage that he would insist in staying in her pocket to avoid detection. With enough affection and gestures of affection, he would eventually become a perky sidekick to a kind and loving mistress.

Making her decision, she fished out of her pocket and held in front of her face and in the palm of her hand.

"Tim, we need to talk."
15332122.title: Natalya keeps you as her pocket pet.

choices: Natalya takes you to her home
Natalya takes you into the remote Russian wilderness
Natalya hides in plain sight, and takes you to her barracks
153321222.content:
"I'll be honest," Natalya continues, her broad face radiating nothing but truth. "We're safe for the moment, but I couldn't say for how much longer. Agents of the enemy are on our trail right now, and we can't stay in one place for too long in case they find us. Even taking the time to talk to you now is probably risking a bullet."

"Thank you so much," you gush. "I was so lucky for you to find me."

"Now we must hide," she continues, drowning out your words with her deep, authoritative voice. "We cannot be remaining here, and so we must go into hiding. Alone somewhere, just us two..."

The way she says that, you get the feeling it won't just be the danger that pulls you both together!
153321222.title: On The Run

choices: Alone and panicked
Sealed in Her Breast Pocket
153322.content:
You dodge out of the parade route to avoid being squashed!

"Ming! Ming! Ming!" You cry, hoping to be rescued.

Ming trips in her high heels.

If she heard you, it would be a way to rescue you. If she didn't, her friends would likely help her back up before you could reach her.

When she gets back up and marches on, you are
153322.title: China

choices: You, Tim, are now a lab specimen of Ming's commander
You, Tim, will now be trained as Ming's pocket pet
1533222.content:
As you rest against the cloth of your girlfriend's uniform pocket, you appreciate the cushion provided by her right breast. Yet as she continues marching through the parade, you begin to get suspicious about the coincidences. The coincidence that you were to meet her at the airport. The coincidence that you shrank at the airport. The coincidence that you blacked out and woke up in her country. The coincidence that she picked you up off the street without showing shock. Too many coincidences.

Ming marched with a smile after picking up her boyfriend without a hitch. Her mother's best friend, an accomplished general and military scientist, had devised shrinking and teleportation technology for her nation's military. That best friend had used her connections to become Ming's commanding officer. It had all worked out so well.

Ming's commander had told her that all the tests needed were done. Still she was toying with the idea of keeping Tim for herself in case she wanted to run more tests. If not, then Ming would be allowed to keep Tim as a pocket pet, provided she pass to her commander notes on how the test subject was adjusting to his new situation.

Later that night, when the parade had ended, Ming unbuttoned her right uniform breast pocket and fished Tim out of it.
1533222.title: Sealed in Her Breast Pocket

choices: She pretends to protect you from her superiors
She openly admits her superiors gave you to her as a pocket pet.
15332222.content:
Before releasing her Tiny Tim from the pocket of her army uniform, Ming bit her lip. Tim Thompson had been pleasantly surprised when Ming had chosen him as a boyfriend. On the one hand, he was introverted and less of a stud than many of his classmates. But Ming had chosen him with a suitable pocket pet in mind. He was a witty and funny companion. If she revealed to him, what had happened, then his timidity and desire for a woman's affection could be easily be used to train him to be a docile pet in short order.

On the other hand, revealing to him her betrayal of him and reduction of him to be a shrunken test subject would break his heart. Certainly he would be a less perky pocket pet. She could say that she was a rogue agent, trying to save him from her superiors to allay any suspicions and insist that he stay hidden to help her protect him. That would have the added advantage that he would insist in staying in her pocket to avoid detection. With enough affection and gestures of affection, he would eventually become a perky sidekick to a kind and loving mistress.

Making her decision, she fished out of her pocket and held in front of her face and in the palm of her hand.

"Tim, we need to talk."
15332222.title: How to Handle a Pocket Pet

choices: Betrayed that she did this to you
Your insecurities get the better of you and you feel somewhat flattered
Before you can decide how feel, another woman soldier sees you and Ming
153322222.content:
“Yes we do” you agree. “Now what the hell is going on here? Why am I so small? Why am I in China? How did I get here? And why did you show no surprise in seeing...”

Ming gently pushed her giant finger against your minuscule head to “sush” you. She begins to stroke your back as she starts to speak.

“Relax my dear.” She says in a soothing tone. “I will explain everything. You see, I’ve always wanted to have a tiny man to call my own. That way I can keep you forever without the fear that you will leave me.”

Upon hearing this all you can do is just stare at her giant face in shock as she continues talking in her booming voice.

“You fit everything I want in a companion and I was tired of waiting due to this long distance relationship of ours. So I had you shrunk down and brought here so I could have you as my pet right away.”

“B-but” You stammer. “How did this happen? People just don’t shrink and end up on the other side of the world!”

“Well, since there’s no way you can escape I will tell you.” Ming says smiling at you. “My mom’s best friend is a scientist that works for the military who has been working on a prototype that can shrink and teleport people. Of course, it’s meant to be used on enemy troops but she needed to test it. So, I had the idea to her how I wished my boyfriend in the United States could be my tiny pet and she agreed to test it on you and teleport you here as a test subject. Apparently she ran tests on you while you were passed out. But don’t worry, they were harmless, they were just to make sure you weren’t hurt in the process and that the effects are permanent. Anyways, after the tests were done she said I could keep you but she left you on the side of the parade route for me to snatch you up so it would look like she had no part in it.”

You couldn’t believe what you just heard. You sit in Ming’s palm dumbfounded as she continues to pet you.

How do you feel?
153322222.title: The truth

info.brief_description: You are shrunk in an airport.
info.description:
The premise of the story is simple: While at an airport, you blank out and wake up after having shrunk to about an 1 inch tall. "You" are a male and in your twenties. The reason for you shrinking is unknown (unless explained in a thread). Feel free to let your imagination take you.

Let's set up some ground rules:

1) No male interactions and no toilet (You can have a male bring a shrunken individual to a female, but keep the male interaction very brief, no more than a few sentences. Don’t dwell on it.)

2) Please make sure your post advances the story in some way, as opposed to short pointless posts like "She smashed you, and you died."

3) Good grammar is preferable. Not to say, I'll hound you for having a slight mistake, but if there are so many misspelling or grammar, then it's unreadable. Also use punctuation. I don't want to sound like a perfectionist, but these things exist so that the reader can read it easily.

4) Use paragraphs breaks. This may seem like an odd rule, but I've seen too many posts in various Interactives write the whole thing as only long paragraph. It's incredibly hard to read as it is hard on the eyes. USE WHITE SPACE! It exists for a reason. Otherwise, readers have trouble following it.

When you have dialogue, try to make every new statement its own paragraph. That makes it easier to read.

5) Make sure to have at least 2 options for each post you make. In interactives the point is to have options, so don't force the reader to go a certain path too often.

6) I prefer humiliation, feet, vore, mouth play, crush, slave, and entrapment, but you don't have to follow my preferences. Make your posts your own.

Otherwise have fun! Don't get put off by the boring part of establishing rules: it's annoying but necessarily.
